<p>84a.6</p>blangs te/ g.yon pas dril bu bzung la/ g.yas pas kyang spos khang bzung ste dril bu dkrol zhing / rje btsun gyi yi ge brgya pa lan cig bzlas te/ oM badzra d+h+r-i ka AH hUM swA hA/ oM dzi na dzika AH hUM swA hA/ oM rat+na d+h+r-i ka AHhUM swA hA/ oM A ro l-i ka AH hUM
<p>84a.7</p>swA hA/ oM pradz+nyA d+h+r-i ka AH hUM swA hA/ oM ru ru sbu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+hi lo tsa ne sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ oM AHshaM ga re shAn+ti ka re g+hu Ta g+hu Ti ni g+hu Ta ya g+ha Ta ya g+hu Ti ni swA hA/ oM a ka Te bi ka Te ni ka Te ka TaM ka Te ga ro Ti bIr+ya swA hA/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ oM
<p>84b</p>
<p>84b.1</p>na maHsa man+ta kA ya bAka tsit+ta badzrA NAM/ na mo badzra kro d+hA ya/ ma hA daMShoT+T+ka Ta b+he ra bA ya a si mu sa la d+ha rA ya pa ri shu pA sha ha stA ya/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li kha kha khA hi khA hi/ taSh+Thi TaSh+Thi/ b+nad+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gardza gardza/ bis+phoT ya bi
<p>84b.2</p>s+pho Ta ya/ sarba bi g+h+nAM bi nA ya ka ne ma hA gA Na pa ti dzI bi ta an+ta ka rA ya swA hA zhes bya ba sngags de rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa la ar+g+ha dang me tog la sogs pas mchod cing snga ma bzhin du spos gtul ba dang / dril bu dkrol zhing mar
<p>84b.3</p>me dang / lha bshos dang / snod gang ba la sogs pa phul zhing lag pa g.yon pa sgeg pa dang bcas pas dril bu blangs la/ lag pa g.yas pa ku sha dang bcas pas rdo rje rtse gsum gyi phyag rgya bum pa'i steng du bzhag la/ rang rang sngags kyi bum pa rnams rje
<p>84b.4</p>btsun gyi yi ge brgya pa dang bcas pas lan brgya rtsa brgyad rnam par rgyal ba la yongs su bzlas la/ de bzhin du bum pa gzhan dag kyang lan nyi shu rtsa bdun bzlas la/ yang me tog la sogs pas mchod cing thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pas zhu bar
<p>84b.5</p>gyur par bsam pa ni bum pa byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /de nas sngar bshad pa'i bris sku la sogs pa'i bcom ldan 'das yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la/ sku khrus kyi las brtsam par bya ste/ dang por snga ma bzhin du spos gtul la 'bras chan gyi chang bu gnyis
<p>84b.6</p>dang me snod dang / mar me rnams snod dam bum pa la bzhag ste/ mdun du gnas pa'i yungs kar lag pas blangs te/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis mngon par bsngags la/ oM sarba pA paM da ha na badzrA ya swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis me dang / chu la
<p>84b.7</p>gtor la lag pa gnyis kyis blangs te/ sku gzugs la sogs pa'i mdun du lan gsum bskor la phyi rol du bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis gtor bar bya'o/ /de nas bsang gtor gyi chus khrus kyi rdzas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis lan gsum bsang gtor
<p>85a</p>
<p>85a.1</p>byas te/ me tog la sogs pa yang de bzhin du bsang gtor byas la/ de nas dril bu'i sgra dang / spos gtul zhing shin tu phyis pa'i me long gi gzugs brnyan la rang gi sngags kyis zhabs bsil lan gsum phul te/ chus bkrus la rim gyis dri
<p>85a.2</p>zhim po'i til mar dang / bag phyes me long mnyes te/ chus bkrus la/ yang ar+g+ha dang me tog phul la/ mar dang sbrang rtsis bkru zhing bag phyes mnye zhing chus bkrus te/ zho dang / 'o ma dang / 'bru dang / 'bras yos dang / star ka la sogs pa'i 'bras bu dang
<p>85a.3</p>me tog dang / ar+g+ha dang lhan cig so sor khrus gsol la/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis de ltar byas la/ bum pa rnams me tog dang spos kyis mchod la/ rim gyis dbang bskur brtsam par bya'o/ /dang po las thams
<p>85a.4</p>cad kyi bum pa sngags kyi rgyal po bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags dang / ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni/ /lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ba/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo/ /zhes dbang bskur ro/ /de nas shar gyi bum
<p>85a.5</p>pas dzin dzika ces bya ba'i sngags dang / sngar bshad pa'i tshigs su bcad pas sku khrus phul la/ de bzhin du rat+na d+h+r-i ka ces bya ba dang / pradz+nyA d+h+r-i ka ces bya ba dang / A ro l-i ka ces bya ba dang / pad+ma d+h+r-i ka ces bya ba dang / ru ru s+phu ru dang / shaM ka ri dang / a
<p>85a.6</p>ka Te dang / tA re zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags rnams dang / rang rang gi bum pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /yang rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la me tog gtor zhing spos gtul te/ rje btsun gyi yi ge brgya pa dang / oM
<p>85a.7</p>badzra d+h+r-i ka ces bya ba'i sngags lan bdun bzlas la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya shri ye hUM zhes bya ba dang / yang sngags kyi rgyal po brjod cing dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas legs par bdugs pa'i ras blangs te/ me long la chus phyis pa'i dri'i thig
<p>85b</p>
<p>85b.1</p>le lnga byas te/ me tog gtor zhing bzhag la/ dril bu dang spos blangs te/ snga ma bzhin du mchod cing ci 'byor pas lha bshos phul te/ gtor ma gtong zhing phyag btsal nas ldang bar bya'o zhes sku khrus kyi cho ga'o/ /de nas sngar lhag par gnas pa'i bris sku la
<p>85b.2</p>sogs pa la rab tu gnas pa bya ste/ de'i rim pa ni bris sku dang / gzugs sku la sogs pa stong pa nyid du bsgoms te/ yang rang gi chos kyi yi ge yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa de'i sku bsgoms la/ mngon du gzhag cing mgo bo dang / lkog ma dang snying gar sna
<p>85b.3</p>tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma dang / zla ba'i steng du yi ge gsum bkod la de'i 'od zer gyis nam mkha' las rigs gsum bkug ste de nyid du bcug la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab par bsams la mngon du gyur par blta bar bya'o/ /de nas ye
<p>85b.4</p>shes sems dpa'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi 'khor lo bkug cing / de nyid du bcug la bcings shing dbang du byas te/ 'o ma dang chu bzhin du ro gcig par gyur par bsam par bya'o/ /dam tshig dang ye shes sems dpa' gcig tu gyur par
<p>85b.5</p>bltas la/ snga ma bzhin du bgegs bskrad cing bsrungs la yi ge brgya pas brtan par byas la/ yi ge gsum gyis rjes su chags la/ rdo rje dang dril bu blangs te/ spos gtul nas spyan drang bar bya ste/ mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes sogs/ /rdo rje
<p>85b.6</p>mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /'gro ba yi ni don mdzad phyir/ /'dir ni rtag tu bzhugs su gsol/ /ji srid nam mkha' ri rabs/ /ji srid nyi zla rgyu skar dang / /ji srid thub pa'i bstan bcos te/ /de srid 'dir ni bzhugs su gsol/ /rtag tu
<p>85b.7</p>'khor dang bcas pa yi/ /rgyal po dang ni yon bdag dang / /bdag dang slob mar bcas skyob phyir/ /'dir ni rtag tu bzhugs su gsol/ /zhes gsol ba btab nas sngar bzhin du bkug cing mchod pa rnam pa lnga sngon du 'gro bar gur kum gyis
<p>86a</p>
<p>86a.1</p>byugs pa'i ras gnyis phul nas ma sha lnga'i tshad tsam gyis gser gyi mig thur gyis oM tsuk+Sha tsuk+Sha sa man+ta tsak+Shu bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis spyan phye ste/ zho dang 'bras chan me tog dang bcas pa'i lha bshos oM badzra a mr-i te swA hA/ 
<p>86a.2</p>zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis phul la/ rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du dbyibs dang bcas pa'i me tog gi phreng ba phul te/ mchod yon dang 'thor 'thung dang / zhabs bsil phul ba sngon du 'gro bar lhag ma'i rdzas kyis mchod cing bstod nas phyag 'tshal zhing
<p>86a.3</p>bskor ba byas te/ bzod par gsol nas mngon par 'dod pa'i don gnyer bar bya ste rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas mchod pa'i cho ga brtsam par bya ste/ snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su lha rnams spros te/ ye shes sems dpa' dang
<p>86a.4</p>gnyis su med par byas la/ sku khrus dang / zhabs bsil dang / mchod yon dang / phyag bzhi sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod par bya'o/ /de'i rim pa ni me tog 'di ni dge ba'i mchog /gtsang zhing gtsang ma'i rgyu dang ldan/ /bdag gis dad
<p>86a.5</p>pas 'bul lags na/ /bzhes te bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pe pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ya shri ye hUM/ oM badzra puSh+pe AH hUM swA hA/ zhes bya ba rang rang gi sngags dang me tog dbul lo/ /de bzhin du lhan cig skyes pa dang sbyar
<p>86a.6</p>ba'i spos gtul la/ nags tshal bcud ni yi gar 'ong / /dri zhim rgyas pa lha yi spos/ /bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags na/ /bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hU pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ya shri ye hUM/ oM badzra d+hU pe AH hUM swA
<p>86a.7</p>hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis dbul lo/ /mar me'i snod blangs la/ gdon rnams 'joms shing bkra shis la/ /dge zhing mun sel mar me 'di/ /bdag gis dang bas 'bul lags na/ /bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta dI
<p>86b</p>
<p>86b.1</p>pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ya shri ye hUM/ oM badzra dI pe AH hUM swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis dbul lo/ /de bzhin du/ lhan cig skyes dang sbyar ba dang / /de bzhin yongs su gyur pa ste/ /bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags nas/ /bzhes nas bdag
<p>86b.2</p>la dgyes par mdzod/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+he pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spa ra Na sa ma ya shri ye hUM/ oM badzra gan+d+he AHhUM swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis dbul lo/ /de bzhin du ro drug dang ldan pa'i lha bshos kyi snod blangs te/ 'di ni bdud rtsi'i ngo bo ste/ kha zas
<p>86b.3</p>rnams kyi gtsang sbra rnams/ /bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags na/ /bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta nai bi d+ye pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ya shri ye hUM/ oM badzra ne bi d+ya AH hUM swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis dbul
<p>86b.4</p>lo/ /de bzhin du na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bden dang / rol mo dang / mchod pa'i khyad par ni rang gi sngags kyis dbul bar bya'o/ /'di ni phyi'i mchod pa'i rim pa'o/ /de nas pad+ma'i snod la bdud rtsi lnga sbyang ba dang / sad pa dang
<p>86b.5</p>sbar ba'i rim pas bdud rtsir byas la lcags kyu rnams kyang de bzhin du bskyed la/ dkyil 'khor pa rnams la dbul lo/ /oM a mr-i te na pr-i Na ya me swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags so/ /de nas lo bcu gnyis sam/ bcu drug gam nyi shu lon pa'i bu mo rigs kyis
<p>86b.6</p>dbye bas blangs nas rigs lngas khyab par byas te/ rdo rje dang pad+ma 'dus byas pa sngon du 'gro bar snyoms par 'jug pa'i sbyor bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dag gi lam nas zhugs te/ rtsa dbus ma nas snang ba la sogs pa myong ba sngon du 'gro bar
<p>86b.7</p>pad+mar spros la/ dung por gyis blangs te dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su dbul lo/ /oM ma hA su kha badzra ho su ra ta s+t+waM su ra te haM zhes bya ba sngags so/ /de nas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i bla na med pa'i mchod pas bcom ldan 'das la
<p>87a</p>
<p>87a.1</p>mchod do/ /langs te phyag 'tshal zhing bskor ba byas te/ bzod par gsol nas smon lam btab ste/ chos thams cad so sor snang ba tsam du bltas te gnas par bya'o zhes mchod pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas sngar lhag par gnas par byas pa'i slob ma
<p>87a.2</p>rnams kyi gdong g.yogs te sgor bzhag la gsol ba gdab par byed du gzhug go/ /bcom ldan slob dpon dam pa ni/ /'khor ba las ni skyob pa'i phyir/ /skye dang sdug bsngal rga shi yi/ /zhags pas bdag ni rab tu gdungs/ /de phyir bdag ni 'jigs pa
<p>87a.3</p>yis/ /khyod la rtag tu skyabs su mchi/ /sngags kyi lam gyi theg pa yis/ /bdag la rjes su bzung bar mdzod/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /khyod ni ston pa dga' chen po/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul mchog ni/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /
<p>87a.4</p>sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang / /skyabs gsum po ni bdag la stsol/ /dam tshig mchog ni bdag la stsol/ /sdom pa yang ni bdag la stsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong khyer la/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal/ /zhes bya bas slob mas gsol ba
<p>87a.5</p>btab pa'i 'og tu rdo rje slob dpon gyis thal mo sbyar ba me tog dang ldan pa'i slob ma phyag bzhi byed du bcug la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bud+d+ha ko la maN+Da le di ba ta b+h+ya kA ya bA ka tsit+ta pra Na me pA da ban+d+hA naM ka ro mi/ shar du'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta rat+na ko la di ba ta b+h+ya kA ya bA ka
<p>87a.6</p>tsit+ta pra Na me na pA da ban+d+hA naM ko ro mi/ lho ru'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pad+ma ko la di ba ta b+h+ya kA ya bA ka tsit+ta pra Na me ban+d+hA naM ka ro mi/ nub tu'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta karma ko la di ba ta b+h+ya kA ya bA ka tsit+ta pra Na me na pA da ban+d+hA naM ka ro mi/ byang du'o/ /de nas mdang khyod kyis rmi
<p>87a.7</p>lam ji lta bu mthong zhes bla mas dris la/ slob mas dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rmi lam brjod do/ /bla mas kyang de dang mthun pa'i dngos grub bstan par bya'o/ /de nas khyod kyi mig la ji ltar snang zhes dris la sngon po la sogs pa snang ngo zhes gal te smra na de'i tshe rigs
<p>87b</p>
<p>87b.1</p>dang mthun pa'i dngos grub bshad par bya'o/ /de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bzlas pa'i las thams cad pa'i chu de'i lag par sbyin te/ 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig nyams na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs pas dngos grub ster/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu
<p>87b.2</p>'thung shig /oM badzra a mr-i ta u da ka ThaHThaH ThaH traM AH hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis mna' chu sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor la me tog phreng ba 'thor du gzhug ste/ gang du me tog babs gyur pa/ /de la de yi rigs bstan bya// /dbus
<p>87b.3</p>kyi re'u mig babs pa na/ /phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas lha mo'i re'u mig la/ /babs par gyur na dngos grub mchog /mchod pa'i lha mo'i re'u mig la/ /babs par gyur na zhi sogs 'gyur/ /sems dpa' khro bo'i gnas su ni/ /babs
<p>87b.4</p>na de nyid bstan par bya/ /sgo la babs na bar pa ni/ /de yi phyi rol dngos grub dman/ /gang tshe kun gyi phyi rol du/ /me tog babs na de yi tshe/ /slar yang dbus su phab tu gzhug /der ma bab na dngos grub med/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas
<p>87b.5</p>me tog blangs te/ gzugs rdo rje ma'i sngags kyis de'i spyi bor gdab par bya'o/ /de la zab pa dang / rgya che ba'i mtshan nyid kyi chos bstan pas mgu bar bya ste thar pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor du ni ltos shig ces smras te/ oM tsak+Shu zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i
<p>87b.6</p>sngags dang / rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyis/ /mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad/ /mig rnams thams cad 'byed mdzad de/ /rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med/ /ces bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod nas gdong g.yogs dgrol bar bya'o/ /de nas slob
<p>87b.7</p>ma ngo mtshar gyis mig rgyas pas dkyil 'khor la bltas te/ phyag bzhi bya'o/ /de nas snga ma bzhin du maN+Dal dang / mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod nas gsol ba btab pa la 'jug ste/ skyabs med skyabs phyir skyob 'gyur ba/ /'gro ba skyob pa'i rgyu yin te/ /rdo rje 'chang
<p>88a</p>
<p>88a.1</p>chen mi phyed pa/ /bdag la di ring bskyab tu gsol/ /rnam shes lnga ni gti mug gi/ 'dam pa dag par bya ba'i phyir/ /rig pa'i dbang bskur chu yis ni/ /bdag gi yid ni dga' bar mdzod/ /ces bya bas gsol ba btab pa gsan nas/ /sangs rgyas
<p>88a.2</p>chos dang dge 'dun te/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song / /de nas sangs rgyas rigs mchog la/ /dam tshig sdom par bshad pa yin/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dag /blo chen khyod kyis gzung bar bya/ /byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ /shes rab dril bu zhes
<p>88a.3</p>bshad do/ /slob dpon yang ni gzung bya ste/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /de ni rdo rje'i rigs dag la/ /dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams/ /
<p>88a.4</p>rin chen rigs la mtho ba'o/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos kyang khyod kyis gzung / /de ni pad+ma'i rigs dag la/ /dam tshig sdom pa yin par bshad/ /sdom pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i/ /de nyid du ni gzung bar gyis/ /mchod pa'i las ni
<p>88a.5</p>ci nus gyis/ /las kyi rigs mchog dam pa'o/ /khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya/ /ma byin par yang blang mi bya/ /'dod pas log par mi spyad cing / /brdzun yang smra bar mi bya ste/ /nyes pa kun gyi rtsa ba yi/ /chang 'thung ba yang spang bar bya/ /bya ba ma
<p>88a.6</p>yin thams cad spang / /sems can don la rgyab phyogs min/ /'khor ba spang bar mi bya zhing / /mya ngan 'das la chags bya min/ /dam pa rnams kyi gam du gnas/ /rnal 'byor pa la bkur ste bya/ /lus kyi las ni rnam pa gsum/ /ngag gi rnam pa
<p>88a.7</p>bzhi dag dang / /yid kyi rnam pa gsum yin te/ /ci nus par ni gsung bar bgyi/ /theg pa chung la 'dod mi bya/ /sems can don ni kun du spyod/ /lha dang lha min gsang ba la/ /khyod kyis brnyas par bya ba min/ /phyag rgya bzhon pa phyag mtshan dang / /
<p>88b</p>
<p>88b.1</p>mtshan ma rnams kyang bgom mi bya/ /de ni sdom pa zhes gsungs te/ /blo chen khyod kyis bsrung bar gyis/ /de nas bla ma'i gsung des ni/ /sdom pa legs par gzung bar bya/ /ji ltar mgon pos bka' stsal pa/ /de bzhin du ni bdag gis spyad/ /dkon mchog
<p>88b.2</p>gsum la skyabs 'gro la sogs dang / /rdo rje la sogs gzung dang sbyin pa bzhi/ /rnam pa gsum gyis chos dang mchod pa dag /khyod kyis gsung gi bdag gis gzung bar bgyi/ /srog gcod pa la sogs pa dag las ni/ /so sor log dang gzhan yang sdom
<p>88b.3</p>pa'i tshogs/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pha rol bsgral ba'i phyir/ /mgon po yang dag bdag gis gzung bar bgyi/ /de nas dkyil 'khor pa'i bum pa rnams kyi chu pad+ma'i snod du gcig tu bsdus te/ rnal 'byor bzhi yi rim gyis mi bskyod par byas la/ /mchod cing
<p>88b.4</p>snyoms par zhugs pas zhu zhing / chu'i rnam par bltas la rdo rje 'chang gi rang bzhin gyis slob ma'i spyi bor dbang bskur ro/ /dbang bskur ba ni/ oM badzra de ba dat+ta a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ zhes bya ba ni chu'i dbang ngo / /de nas lugs ma la sogs pa'i cod pan la de bzhin du rin
<p>88b.5</p>chen 'byung ldan bsams la/ snyoms par 'jug pas zhu zhing / dbu rgyan gyi rnam pa de'i spyi bor bzhag la/ oM rat+na d+h+r-i ka AHhUM/ zhes bya ba ste dbu rgyan gyi dbang ngo / /de bzhin du rdo rje 'od dpag tu med par bskyed la/ zhu zhing yang rdo rje'i rnam pa de'i lag par byin te/ di
<p>88b.6</p>ring khyod ni dbang bskur ba/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang / sngags kyis dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje'i dbang ngo / /de bzhin du dril bu don yod grub par bskyed la/ lag pa g.yon par gtad la/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /zhes bya ba la
<p>88b.7</p>sogs pas sbyin pa ni bdag po'i dbang ngo / /sngar phog pa'i me tog gi gnas dang mthun par kye che ge mo rdo rje zhes bya ba ni ming gi dbang ngo / /de ni kun gzhi la sogs pa spong bas rig pa'i dbang yin no/ /de nas phyir mi ldog pa thob pa'i phyir/ gsol ba gdab pa la
<p>89a</p>
<p>89a.1</p>'jug ste/ phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo la/ /mgon po dbang bskur bshad du gsol/ /'khor lo lha yi de nyid dang / /slob dpon gyi ni las rnams dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig dang / /sdom pa yang ni bdag la stsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong
<p>89a.2</p>khyer du/ /mgon po bdag ni gzhug tu gsol/ /zhes bya ba slob dpon gyis gsan nas rigs kyi bu slob dpon la smod pa dang / bde gshegs bka' las 'da' ba dang / rdo rje spun la sdang ba dang / byams pa spangs pa dang / byang chub kyi sems dang bral ba dang / theg
<p>89a.3</p>pa gsum la smod pa dang / snod ma yin pa la gsang ba'i chos bshad pa dang / phung po smod pa dang / dag pa'i chos las som nyi dang / gdug pa la byams pa dang / chags pa dang bral ba dang / chos la mtha' gnyis bzhag pa dang / dad pa dang ldan pa'i sems
<p>89a.4</p>smod pa dang / dam tshig dag mi bstan pa dang / /bud med rnams la mi smod pa'o/ /de bzhin du rig ma mi bsten ba dang / dam tshig mi sbyor ba dang / tshogs kyi 'khor lo la brtson pa dang / gsang ba'i chos ston pa dang / dad pa dang ldan pa'i sems can la dam pa'i
<p>89a.5</p>chos log par ston pa dang / nyan thos kyi nang du zhag bdun gnas pa dang / nga rgyal dang / ma nges pa dang / ma sbyar ba dang / snod ma yin pa la gsang ba'i chos bstan par mi bya'o zhes slob mas thos nas/ rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi dang / /sbom po sdig pa bcu
<p>89a.6</p>dga' bar/ /di ring nas brtsams bdag nyid che/ /byang chub thob par mi bgyid do/ /zhes rdo rje slob dpon gyis thos nas phreng ba lag tu byin te/ oM badzra d+h+r-i ka ces bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags dang / rang gi yi dam yang khyod kyis bsgom pa dang bzla bar bya'o zhes
<p>89a.7</p>sngags kyi dbang ngo / /de nas rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rgyan sked pa la sogs pa la btags shing lag par rdo rje bzung la/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /ces pa la sogs pas sbyin te/ rnam par dag pa bshad pa ni rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi dbang ngo / /de nas
<p>89b</p>
<p>89b.1</p>rnam pa gsum gyi spyod pa bstan zhing rna ba g.yas pa dang / g.yon pa la shing gi gdong pa gnyis dang / de dang 'dra ba phyag bzhi dang / ral pa'i thor tshugs btags la/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du spyod pa 'di nyid kyis gnas par bya'o zhes spyod pa'i brtul zhugs so/ /de
<p>89b.2</p>nas/ slar yang khyod la 'chi ba med/ /theg pa chen po 'di nyid las/ /zil gyis mi gnon mi gnod pa/ /gang las 'jigs med rol bar gyis/ /zhes bya ba ni lung bstan pa'o/ /shAkya thub pa'i gzugs dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje slob dpon langs te/ g.yon pa'i chos gos
<p>89b.3</p>kyi dkyil nas gzung la/ g.yas pas mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta swa b+hA ba s+t+waM sarba badzra d+hA ra s+t+waM b+hA ba s+t+waM/ zhes bya ba ni dbugs dbyung ba'o/ /de nas rnam par snang mdzad dang / sgra rdo rje ma'i sngags bzlas pa'i 'khor lo dang / 
<p>89b.4</p>dung lag pa g.yas pa dang g.yon pa la byin te/ deng nas brtsams te/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / chos kyi dung bus shig ces bya ba ni/ 'khor lo dang dung gi dbang ngo / /de nas me long blangs te bstan par bya ba ni/ chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /zhes
<p>89b.5</p>bya ba la sogs pas me long gi dbang ngo / /de nas mda' dang gzhu byin la/ phyogs bzhi dang steng 'og tu 'phang ba'i tshul gyis bdud bzhi las rgyal ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi de kho na nyid so sor rtog pa bshad pa ni mda' dang gzhu'i dbang ngo / /de nas gser gyi
<p>89b.6</p>mig thur gyis/ /ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis/ /rab rib ling tog bsal ba ltar/ /bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa'i/ /rab rib rgyal ba dag gis bsal/ /zhes bya bas mig phye ba ni mig dbye ba'i dbang ngo / /de nas seng ge'i khri la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis
<p>89b.7</p>'dug tu bcug la/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / bla re dang / rol mo'i sgras rdo rje slob dpon gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa blangs te/ nye ba'i sgrub pa po bzhi dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi pos kyang rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i
<p>90a</p>
<p>90a.1</p>bum pa dang / spyan la sogs pa'i bum pa brgyad blangs te/ rgyal ba'i dbang po thugs rdo rje/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid/ /gtso bo dam pa'i bkra shis gang / /khyod la de dang 'dra bar shog /ces bya ba la sogs pa dbyangs gcig dang / dus gcig tu
<p>90a.2</p>bum pa dgu'i chu'i rgyun slob ma'i spyi bor phab cing / ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pas dbang bskur ba/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /de bzhin bdag gis dbang bskur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dang / oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She
<p>90a.3</p>ka te sa ma ya shri ye hUM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas nam mkha' nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bkug cing tshangs pa'i sgo nas zhugs te/ ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i sa bon gyi thig ler bsdu bar bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis
<p>90a.4</p>slob ma la mchod par bya ste/ spyi bor me tog snying gar dri/ /spos dang mar me mdun du ste/ /lha bshos kyang ni mdun du sbyin/ /spos dang dril bus sad par bya/ /de nas/ mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa lngas bstod la/ me
<p>90a.5</p>tog gi phreng ba spyi bor btags la/ oM su pra tiSh+Tha badzre swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis rab tu gnas par byas la dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dang / lha'i de kho na nyid bshad par bya ste/ de la dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid ni mnyam pa nyid ye shes rnam par dag pas gru bzhi
<p>90a.6</p>pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni sgo'o/ /rta babs ni bsam gtan no/ /rdo rje ra ba ni sngags kyi theg pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'o/ /me tog 'od ni de'i 'phro ba'o/ /tshon lnga ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin no/ /'dod yon ni 'dod pa'i yon
<p>90a.7</p>tan lnga'i bdag nyid do/ /rin po che'i pha gu ni ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid do/ /dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa'i snam bu ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi rang bzhin no/ /sa gzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi'i ngo bo'o/ /sna tshogs pad+ma ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin dang / zla ba dang nyi
<p>90b</p>
<p>90b.1</p>ma'i gdan ni thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin no/ /rdo rje'i gur dang / rdo rje la sogs pa'i mtshan ma ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo'o/ /ba dan ni gsung rab yan lag dgu'i rnam par dag pa dang / g.yer kha'i dra ba ni chos kyi sgra'i ngo bo'o/ /bcu gcig rdo rje ni sa bcu
<p>90b.2</p>gcig go/ /'khor lo ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / ri dwags ni gti mug gi rang bzhin te/ gzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid do/ /ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa dang / sa la sogs pa rnam par dag pa ni spyan la sogs pa'o/ /phyi'i
<p>90b.3</p>yul rnam par dag pa ni/ gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa dang / skye mched drug dang / rtsa rgyus dang tshigs rnam par dag pa ni byang chub sems dpa' dang / bdud bzhi bcom pa ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug rnam par dag pa ni mi
<p>90b.4</p>g.yo ba la sogs pa ste/ lha'i de kho na nyid de phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang ngo / /de nas bris sku dang mda' la sogs pa dang bral ba'i sa phyogs gsang ba'i dbang thob pa'i phyir slob mas bla ma la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ khams gsum las ni des grol ba'i/ /nam mkha'
<p>90b.5</p>dang ni mnyam gyur nyid/ /'dod pa rnams kyis mi gos pa/ /dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhis gsol ba btab pa gsan nas/ dam tshig gsum nyan pa'i don du bla mas bstan par bya ste/ spong ba lnga
<p>90b.6</p>dang rig pa lnga/ /rdo rje zhes su bshad pa yin/ /zhes rdo rje'i de kho na nyid do/ /srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag /rang bzhin gyis ni srid bral byas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /srid pa dam pa 'grub pa yin/ /zhes bya ba ni dril bu'i de kho na nyid do/ /phyag
<p>90b.7</p>rgya dam tshig bshad pa ste/ /yid kyi sku ni brtan phyir ro/ /gang gi sku kun brtan pas na/ /phyag rgya'i de nyid mngon par brjod/ /ces bya ba ni phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid do/ /de nas sdom pa gsum bshad par bya ste/ ma ra bi shu mu'i rdzas ni sbyang ba la sogs pa'i rin gyis bza'
<p>91a</p>
<p>91a.1</p>bar bya'o zhes sgron ma myang ba'o/ /go ku da ha na ni kha na ma tho ba med pa bza' bar bya ste/ lcags kyu myong ba'o/ /phyag rgya'i pad+ma la yang tsum+ba na bya ste/ b+ha ga la tsum+ba na smra bar bya'o/ /de rnams kyang slob mas ji ltar bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin bgyi'o
<p>91a.2</p>zhes tshig gsan nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis slob mas phul ba'i lo bcu gnyis pa'i phyag rgya rigs lngas khyab pa/ dang po snyoms par 'jug pa bya ste/ bde ba chen po'i sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nam mkha' nas ngag gi lam nas zhugs te/ rtsa dbus
<p>91a.3</p>ma nas byang chub kyi sems zhu zhing pad+ma'i dbus su spros la/ lag pas ma reg pa dung phor gyis blangs te slob ma'i khar gzhug go/ /slob mas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i blos longs spyad par bya'o/ /de nas lhag ma'i byang chub kyi sems
<p>91a.4</p>rdo rje chu dang sbyar te/ slob ma'i spyi bor sbyin par bya'o/ /slob mas kyang e ma'o bde ba chen po zhes tshig brjod par bya ste/ ji skad du zla gsang thig le las kyang / byang chub sems ni rin chen 'bar spros nas/ /rgyal ba ma lus yang dag dag pa'i sku/ /
<p>91a.5</p>dag pa'i rdo rje ye shes las byung chu/ /rin chen char gyis spyi bor dbang bskur gsol/ /zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur gyi cho ga'o/ /de nas rang spyod pa'am/ phyag rgya gzhan rdo rje slob dpon gyis slob ma la sbyin pa'i phyir gsol ba gdab pa byed du
<p>91a.6</p>gzhug ste/ khong stong khyod kyi sku la med/ /sha dang rus pa khrag kyang med/ /khyod kyis 'jig rten rjes 'jug phyir/ /'jig rten pa yi bya ba bstan/ /sku la nad min mi gtsang min/ /bkres dang skom pa yod ma yin/ /nam mkha'i 'ja' tshon dang mtshungs pa/ /
<p>91a.7</p>khyod kyi sku ni bstan par mdzad/ /ces bya ba la sogs pas gsol ba btab pa gsan nas/ dam tshig dang sdom pa nyan du gzhug ste/ gang zhig dam tshig la sdang dang / /gang zhig dam tshig la smod pa/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir/ /de dag 'bad de
<p>91b</p>
<p>91b.1</p>gsad par bya/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis/ /ser sna can rnams bskyab pa'i phyir/ /gzhan gyi nor rnams phrogs pa na/ /khyod ni sdig pas gos mi 'gyur/ 'dod chags dang mtshungs bde ba med/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams phul na/ /sems can don du
<p>91b.2</p>gzhan gyis smad/ /brtan pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i tshig gis brdzun smra ba/ don yod grub pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /tshig ni bden min smras pa na/ /khyod ni sdig pas gos mi 'gyur/ /rin chen 'byung ldan mgon po yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la yid
<p>91b.3</p>zhugs pas/ /phan phyir rtsub mo smra bas na/ /khyod ni sdig pas gos mi 'gyur/ /da ni dam tshig lnga brjod par bya'o/ /de nas chags pas chags spong phyir/ /dpag med rdo rje bsgom par gyis/ /gti mug gti mug gis 'joms phyir/ /rnam par snang mdzad
<p>91b.4</p>sku la brten/ /zhe sdang zhe sdang gis zhi phyir/ /mi bskyod yongs su bsam par gyis/ /nga rgyal nga rgyal gyis 'joms phyir/ /rin chen gtso bo bsgom par gyis/ /phrag dog phrag dog gis 'joms phyir/ /rta mchog rnam par bsgom par gyis/ /zhes sdom pa lnga
<p>91b.5</p>sbyin par bya'o/ /des kyang brjod par bya ste/ ji ltar mgon pos bka' stsal pa/ /de lta bu ni bdag gis spyad/ /ces thos nas sngar bshad pa'i phyag rgya de la sbyin no/ /de nas khri la bzhugs pa'i phyag rgya phyogs kyi gos can skra grol zhing slob ma la 'di skad brjod par
<p>91b.6</p>bya ste/ bshang gci dag ni bza' ba ste/ /khyod kyis bud med spyod nus sam/ /rak+ta shu kra sha dang ni/ /bud med rnams ni mgu ba dang / /b+ha ga'i pad+ma tsum+ba na/ /ci bde bas ni smra bar gyis/ /slob mas kyang smra bar bya ste/ shu kra rak+ta la sogs dang / /lha mo bdag ni cis
<p>91b.7</p>mi nus/ /bshang gci la sogs bsten par bgyi/ /bud med rnams ni mgu bar bgyi/ /b+ha ga la yang tsum+pa na/ /ji ltar bka' stsal de ltar bgyi/ /zhes gsan nas yid mgu bar gyur pa'i lha mos lag pa gnyis kyis pad+ma kha phye la slob ma la bstan par bya'o/ /
<p>92a</p>
<p>92a.1</p>e ma'o bdag gi pad+ma 'di/ /bde ba thams cad yang dag ldan/ /gang gis cho gas bsten pa na/ /bdag ni de yi mdun du gnas/ /'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste/ /sems can khams ni rab grol ba/ /bde ba chen po rgyal po 'dir/ /dngos
<p>92a.2</p>po kun gyis yang dag gnas/ /zhes smras te/ rtsa'i 'khor lo bstan par bya'o/ /'dir pad+ma'i dbus su rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis gang yin pa de dag bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa dkyil 'khor pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /de rnams kyi nang na rtsa lnga ni
<p>92a.3</p>gtso bo ste/ rtsa dbus ma gang yin pa de ni 'dod pa'i gdugs chu'i khams rgyu bas mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo'o/ /mdun du gnas pa'i rtsa gang yin pa de ni/ lhas byin zhes bya ba bshang ba rgyu ba dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam
<p>92a.4</p>par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid do/ /g.yas kyi rtsa rus sbal ma gang yin pa de ni khrag rgyu ba/ rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo'o/ /rgyab tu nor rgyal ma gang yin pa de ni sha rgyu ba don yod grub
<p>92a.5</p>pa'i rang bzhin bya ba nan tan sgrub pa'i bdag nyid do/ /de bzhin du g.yon gyi rtsa zla ba ma gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi sems rgyu ba 'od dpag tu med pa'i rang bzhin so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid do/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi las/ b+ha ga'i dbus su nam mkha'
<p>92a.6</p>gang / /nam mkha' lnga yis brgyan pa ste/ /lte ba ge sar dang ldan pa/ /'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan/ /bdud rtsi rgyu ba'i rtsa gang yin/ /b+ha ga'i dbus su rab tu gnas/ /rtsa gzhan sum cu rtsa gnyis ni/ /de yi dbus su gtso bo yin/ /zhes smos te
<p>92a.7</p>slob ma las su rung ba'i rdo rje'i rtse mor snyoms par 'jug pas snang ba la sogs pa'i ye shes mtshon du gzhug go/ /de nas pad+mar spros pa'i byang chub kyi sems spro zhing lces myang bar bya ste shes rab kyi dbang ngo / /de nas slob mas bde ba chen po myong zhing / me tog
<p>92b</p>
<p>92b.1</p>gis gang ba'i thal mo sbyar te/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi spyan sngar phyin nas khyod kyi sku drin gyis bdag gis de kho na nyid thob po zhes smos pa la/ slob dpon gyis smra bar bya ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi sems zhu ba'i dus su bde ba gang yin pa de ni snang ba dang / bsnyen pa dang / 
<p>92b.2</p>rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i skad cig ma'i ngo bo'o/ /yan lag thams cad du phyin pa'i dus su snang ba mched pa dang / nye bar bsgrub pa dang / rnam par smin pa'i skad cig ma'i bdag nyid do/ /de la dang po gsum rdo rje'i dkyil du phyin pa'i dus su snang ba thob pa dang / sgrub
<p>92b.3</p>pa dang / rnam par 'joms pa'i skad cig ma'i bdag nyid do/ /rdo rje rtse mor gnas pa'i dus su 'od gsal ba dang / sgrub pa chen po dang / mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i skad cig ma'i bdag nyid do/ /de la dang po gsum ni spang bar bya ba dang bzhi pa ni blang bar
<p>92b.4</p>bya ba'o zhes thos nas slob mas pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs te/ dngos po thams cad dang bral ba/ /phung po khams dang skye mched rnams/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnams spangs pa/ /chos kun bdag med mnyam nyid kyis/ /rang sems mthong bar
<p>92b.5</p>ma skyes pa/ /stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo'o/ /zhes brjod pa/ bla ma la me tog dbul zhing yon dbul bar bya ste/ gser dang dngul dang rin po che/ /ba glang rta dang glang po rnams/ /khang pa zhing dang bzhon pa dang / /rna cha mgul rgyan gdu bu dang / /dar dang za 'og na bza' dang / /nyal khri
<p>92b.6</p>dang ni gdan rnams dang / /bran dang bran mo btsun mo dang / /shin tu yid 'ong btsun mo dang / /bdag nyid kyang ni phul ba na/ /de las lhag ma gzhan ci mchis/ /zhes bya ba'o/ /gsang ba thams cad las bdag nyid bla ma la phul nas/ slar yang
<p>92b.7</p>rin gyis bslu bar bya/ /zhes shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ste/ dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas gtor ma bya ste/ de'i rim pa ni mdun gyi nam mkha' la 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma dmigs te/ de'i lte ba dang 'dab ma rnams la cig
<p>93a</p>
<p>93a.1</p>car du skyes pa/ sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bsams te/ rang gi lha'i nga rgyal gyis spos dang / dril bus bkug la mdun du rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du pad+ma'i snod la bdud rtsi lnga spyan ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis bsgrubs
<p>93a.2</p>te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pri Na ya me swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyag rgyas phul la shing drung gi rtsa bar gtang ngo / /khyod kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas gshegs su gsol ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i gtor ma'i cho ga'o/ /
<p>93a.3</p>de nas de bzhin du mdun gyi nam mkha' la rtsibs bcu pa'i 'khor lo ser po dmigs la/ de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa dmigs la/ de'i thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis khro bo bcu spros la/ rang rang gi rtsibs su dgod cing sems dpa' gsum
<p>93a.4</p>gyi bdag nyid du byas la ye shes kyi 'khor lo bcug ste/ spos dang / dril bu'i sgra dang / yi ge brgya pa brjod pas dgug par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs dang mtshams bcu la chu'i maN+Dal bcu byas te/ de'i steng du snod bcu bza' ba la sogs pa dang / 
<p>93a.5</p>bcas pa bzhag cing bdud rtsir byas te/ rang rang gi sngags kyis dbul lo/ /de'i sngags ni/ na maH sa man+ta b+hud+d+he b+h+yo na mo badzra mung+ga ra hastA naya tsaN+Da maN+Dal oM k+She pa ka rA ya hUM phaT/ gshin rje gshed kyi'o/ /namaHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo ma hA daN+Da d+ha ra bi d+ha su rA su ra mar+d+ha na b+hu tra tAM
<p>93a.6</p>nirma thA hUM phaT/ shes rab mthar byed kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+ho/ hu lu hu lu ma hA pad+ma a mr-i te ku ru ma hA bi Sha NA aH/ pad+ma mthar byed kyi'o/ /na maH sa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ na mo badzra kro d+hA ya ma hA daM Sh+T+wo ta ka Ta b+he+e ra bA ya badzra san+do haM dar+pA ya a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM phaT/ 
<p>93a.7</p>bgegs mthar byed kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+ho ya ma daN+DA ya nI la daN+DA ya tu ru tu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ sarba duSh+TAM mA ra ya mA ra ya hUM phaT/ dbyig sngon gyi'o/ /na maHsa maN+Ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ na mo ma hA ba lA ya u tsuSh+Tha po d+ha rA dzA ya sarba nA ga naM/ hr-i da yaM tA DA ya hUM phaT/ 
<p>93b</p>
<p>93b.1</p>stobs po che'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ /na mo a tsa la kA na tset+ta tsit+ta/ mot+ta mot+ta/ tut+ta tut+ta/ g+ha g+ha/ g+hA Ta ya g+hA Ta ya hUM phaT/ mi g.yo ba'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+ho/ /Tak+ki hUM dzaH 'dong ba'i rgyal po'i'o/ /oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM hUM phaT/ gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na hUM hUM
<p>93b.2</p>phaT/ gr-i h+NA pa ya gr-i h+NA pa ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga bA na badzra rA dza hUM hUM phaT/ gnod mdzes kyi'o/ /na maH sa ma n+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ na maH sa man+ta d+ha rmA nAM/ na maH sa man+ta saM g+hA nAM/ oM si tA ta pa tre/ oM bi ma la/ oM shaM ka ra/ oM pra t+yaM gi ra badzra
<p>93b.3</p>uSh+NI Sha tsakra brti sarba yan+t+ra man+t+ra mU la karma ban+d+ha naM/ tA DA nAM/ ki lA nAM bA ma ma kr-i tam ta da sarbA n+du/ ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ tsi ri tsi ri/ gi ri gi ri ma ra ma ra/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'o/ /de dag brjod cing
<p>93b.4</p>rang rang gi gnas su gtor ma gtang ngo / /gtor ma gtang ba ni khro bo'i rgyal po'i gtor ma'i cho ga'o/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi'i gtor ma'i rim pa ni 'di yin te/ re zhig dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhir bza' ba la sogs pas gang ba'i snod bzhi
<p>93b.5</p>bzhag la/ mdun du dang po rang gi ming gi yi ge yongs su gyur pa las rgyal po chen po bzhi dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / nag po rnams khro ba dang / rmog dang bcas pa/ dung dang ral gri 'chang ba/ sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid ye shes
<p>93b.6</p>sems dpa' dgug cing bzhugs par bsams la/ snga ma bzhin du mngon du byas la rang rang gi sngags kyis gtor ma sbyin par bya ste/ oM d+h+r-i Ta raSh+Tha ya gan+d+ha r+b+ha se na de ba ta ye maM ba lim pra tIts+tsha sa ma ya/ ma nu sma ra AH hUM phaT swA hA/ yul 'khor skyong gi'o/ /oM
<p>93b.7</p>bi rU b+ha kA ya ma hA kuM b+ha N+da de ba ta ye maM ba liM pra tIts+tsha sa ma ye ma nu sma ra AH hUM phaT swA hA/ 'phags skyes po'i'o/ /oM bi rU pAk+ShA ya ma hA nA ga de ba te ye ma ba liM pra tIts+tsha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra AH hUM phaT swA hA/ mig mi bzang gi'o/ /oM bai shra ba NA ya ma hA yak+Sha
<p>94a</p>
<p>94a.1</p>de ba ta ye maM ba liM pA tI ts+tsha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra AH hUM phaT swA hA/ rnam thos sras kyi'o/ /sngags de rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs la/ rang rang gi phyogs su gtor ma gtang ba ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i gtor ma'i cho ga'o/ /de nas 'byung po thams
<p>94a.2</p>cad kyi gtor ma ni dang po nam mkha' la paM las pad+ma chen po 'dab ma brgyad pa dmar po bsgoms la/ de'i lte bar chos 'byung gi nang du gnas pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po bsams la grwa gsum la khams gsum dang / 'dab ma brgyad la brgya byin la sogs pa
<p>94a.3</p>'jig rten skyong ba brgyad dang / 'dab ma'i 'og tu klu'i rgyal po brgyad dang / sdong bu la ri pa ji lta ba bzhin du lha ma yin dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro dang / dmyal ba pa rnams bsams la/ de rnams kyi sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs te rin chen
<p>94a.4</p>snod dam bum pa bza' ba la sogs pas gang bar byas te/ bdud rtsir byas nas/ spos gtul ba dang / dril bu'i sgras de rnams mngon du byas te/ mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil sbyin pa sngon du 'gro bar/ oM a kA ro mu khaM zhes bya ba la
<p>94a.5</p>sogs pa'i sngags dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'am/ ut+pa la'i phyag rgyas gtog cig la sogs pas gtor ma gtang ba ni 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma'i cho ga ste yan lag bcu pa'o/ /de nas zhag bdun pa la dkyil 'khor pa rnams
<p>94a.6</p>gshegs su gsol te/ nang par langs nas mchod pa rnam pa lngas dkyil 'khor pa rnams mchod la thal mo sbyar zhing / /khyod kyis sems can kun don mdzad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol/ /
<p>94a.7</p>slar yang gshegs par mdzad du gsol/ /bskal pa'am bskal pa brgya yi bar/ /gang gis gzugs sku gnas gyur pa/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung / /lha rnams thams cad srung bar mdzod/ /thugs ni shin tu dgyes gyur nas/ /rang gi gnas su
<p>94b</p>
<p>94b.1</p>gshegs par mdzod/ /bu dang tsha bo slob mar bcas/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang / /slob dpon srung bar mdzad du gsol/ /shes rab ye shes dri ma med/ /dpe med bsam mi khyab la 'dud/ /ces brjod pas yi ge muH'i mtha' can gyi yi
<p>94b.2</p>ge brgya pas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phur bu dang mnga' rnams phyung la 'o mas bkrus te/ rdul tshon chu bo la bskyal zhing / ba'i lci ba dang chus dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi byugs la me tog bkram nas phyag 'tshal zhing smon lam btab nas
<p>94b.3</p>langs te/ ji ltar bde bas gnas par bya ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i cho ga ste yan lag bcu gcig pa'o/ /de nas nyi ma nub par gyur nas dben pa'i phyogs su thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas sems lhag par mos te/ rang gi snying gar
<p>94b.4</p>khaM las skyes pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i chang gzungs la yi ge khaM bkod cing / de la sems gtad nas mig yor lta bur dmigs nas nyal bar bya'o/ /de'i sngon du mthe bo dang gung mos se gol bcu dang gnod mdzes kyi rgyal pos phyogs bcing ba byas na rmi lam
<p>94b.5</p>bzang po mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te rmi lam ngan pa mthong na de'i tshe khro bo'i gtor ma gtang na rmi lam bzang po mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /rmi lam bzang po yang bla ma la smra bar bya ste/ de mi bzhugs na bris sku dang gzugs sku'i spyan sngar smra'i/ gzhan su la yang smra
<p>94b.6</p>bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ste yan lag bcu gnyis pa'o/ /bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba bshad par bya ste/ dpal rdor phreng ba mchog gi srub shing gis/ /zab mo 'dus pa'i rgya mtsho bsrubs byas nas/ /sgrub thabs bdud rtsi rnyad pa gang yin pa/ /'jig rten
<p>94b.7</p>kun des 'chi las 'das par shog /ces smos te/ dpal rdo rje phreng ba zhes bya ba ni bshad pa'i rgyud de stong phrag bcu gnyis pa'o/ /de nyid mchog gi srub shing ste/ /srub par byed pa'i shing dam pa des so/ /zab mo ni zab pa ste mtha' drug la sogs pa'i don gtso bor gyur
<p>95a</p>
<p>95a.1</p>pa'o/ /'dus pa'i rgya mtsho ni gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgya mtsho'o/ /bsrubs byas nas ni rab tu bskyod pa ste/ rnam par sbyangs nas bdag gi sgrub thabs ni mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba sgrub pa'i thabs yan lag gsum cu rtsa brgyad pa/ bdud rtsi dang 'dra ba rnyed pa
<p>95a.2</p>gang yin pa des ni 'jig rten kun te/ ma lus lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams 'chi ba las 'das par shog ces bya ba skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba las 'das pa'i rdo rje 'chang nyid thob par shog ces bsngo ba yin no/ /sa ni dang po thob pa yi/ /dpal
<p>95a.3</p>ldan klu sgrub nyi ma yis/ /'dus pa'i mtsho skyes rgyas pa'i phyir/ /sgrub thabs 'od zer spros par mdzad/ /'gro ba la ni snang mdzad pa/ /mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba 'di/ /yang dag man ngag la brten te/ /de ni bdag gis gsal bar byas/ /rtogs med dbul
<p>95a.4</p>po'i sdug bsngal 'joms byed pa/ /'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgya mtsho'i nang nas byung / /blo bzangs nor bu mkhan gyis legs byas pa/ /skye bo rnams kyi mgul par rgyan du 'gyur/ /rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba/ /skye bo dam pa'i snying 'phrog cing / /rnal 'byor tshul
<p>95a.5</p>rgyan gyis brgyus pa/ /mdor bsdus pa yi sgrub thabs 'grel/ /gangs dang kun+da zla ba ltar dkar ba'i/ /dge ba chen po bdag gis gang rnyed pa/ /'khor ba ma rungs btson ra rnams spangs nas/ /des ni 'gro bas rdo rje 'chang thob shog /mdor bsdus pa'i sgrub
<p>95a.6</p>thabs kyi 'grel pa rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po karma badzra nyid kyis bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa'o/[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ska ha ra tsar+ya a
<p>95a.7</p>ba tar/ bod skad du/ sgrub pa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig shes rab mtshon ni rnon po yis/ /dngos por lta ba'i dra ba rab dral zhing / /dus kyi dgrar gyur nag po'i dpung bcom pa/ /mya ngan 'das rnyed de
<p>95b</p>
<p>95b.1</p>la phyag 'tshal te/ /'gro rnams de yi dbang du gyur pa yis/ /bdud bzhi stobs ni rab tu gzhom pa'i phyir/ /mdo rgyud rtog pa rnams las gsungs pa yi/ /man ngag ye shes rdo rjes bsdus te bstan/ /long ba nyam nga'i lam du bgrod pa dang / /skya 'dzin med
<p>95b.2</p>par gru yis rgal 'dod ltar/ /yongs 'dzin med dang ngan par gyur brten na/ /rtag tu bdud kyis glags ni rnyed par 'gyur/ /tshul 'dir zhugs pas de ma thag nyid kyis/ /goms pa med dang goms par gyur pa'i phyir/ /thob bya med la 'bras bu ji bzhin du/ /
<p>95b.3</p>nag po'i phyogs la mngon du phyogs par 'gyur/ /rtsa ba'i dgrar gyur yul la 'dod min dang / /lhag par 'jig pa nyid du gyur pa'i phyir/ /mtha' gnyis gyur pas log pa'i grong khyer du/ /dbang med sprin gyi dgra yis bdas par 'gyur/ /spro ba med pas las kyi
<p>95b.4</p>mtha' gong zhing / /ha cang brtun ngas rab tu ldog pas na/ /mtha' de gnyis ka'ang rab tu spang bya zhes/ /nyi ma'i rigs las 'khrungs pas mdor gsungs so/ /rang gi sems ni thog ma med pa nas/ /log par zhen phyir rnam par rtog dang bcas/ /de phyir
<p>95b.5</p>rnam par rtog pa 'dir gyur zhes/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dbang pos rab tu gsungs/ /yang dag pa'i lam thob par 'dod pa'i skyes bus rang gi lam nyid du brtsams te/ slob dpon bla ma la zhus pa/ bdud kyi las rnams du zhig mchis pa thos par 'tshal na/ bdag
<p>95b.6</p>la thugs brtse bas bstan du gsol/ bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bdud dang 'chi bdag phung po dang / /nyon mongs yin phyir bdud ni rnam pa bzhi/ /'gro kun snying la nges par gnas pas na/ /thub pa'i lung bzhin de dag las rgyal bya/ /gso ba rig pa mthar phyin gyur
<p>95b.7</p>pa yis/ /yan lag rnam bzhi tshul du 'jug pa ltar/ /bdud bzhi'i nad las nges par thar bya'i phyir/ /gso ba'i yan lag rnam bzhir shes par bya/ /gso ba'i yan lag rnam bzhi tshul gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ bka' stsal pa yod
<p>96a</p>
<p>96a.1</p>de/ mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la tshul bzhin du brten pas so/ /tshul gcig gis ni don 'grub pa/ /bdag gis ma mthong ngo mtshar don/ /gtso bo ji ltar bsnyen bkur zhing / /de yi rgyu mtshan bdag zhu lags/ /bkal stsal pa/ 
<p>96a.2</p>mchod pa thams cad rnam spangs la/ /bla ma yang dag mchod par bya/ /de mnyes pa yis kun mkhyen pa'i/ /ye shes dam pa de thob 'gyur/ /bla med byed pa slob dpon ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid mchod byas/ /de yis bsod nams ma byas ci/ /dka'
<p>96a.3</p>thub ma brten ci zhig yod/ /de nyid mi bzad 'dod pa yis/ /shin tu dga' ba gang dang gang / /shin tu khyad par can nyid de/ /de dang de ni bla mar sbyin/ /slob dpon gyis ni sdig pa 'phrog /slob dpon gyis ni 'jigs pa sel/ /slob dpon gyis ni sdug bsngal
<p>96a.4</p>gyi/ /rgya mtsho 'jig rten pha rol sgrol/ /zhes gsungs so/ /yang bka' stsal pa/ bskal pa dpag tu med par ni/ /thos pa'i pha rol phyin pas kyang / /bla ma'i bka' med sgyu ma ni/ /mngon par bya bar mi nus so/ /de phyir sangs rgyas 'bras 'dod pas/ /nga
<p>96a.5</p>rgyal yongs su btang byas la/ /rdo rje theg pa la bzhon nas/ /'bad pas bla ma mnyes par bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /yang bka' stsal pa/ bla ma sangs rgyas chos gyur cing / /dge 'dun yang ni de nyid de/ /de yi drin gyis shes gyur pas/ /de bas dkon mchog mchog
<p>96a.6</p>gsum yin/ /mi shes rab rib kyis rmongs la/ /'di ni lam rab ston byed yin/ /bde ba kun gyi mchog 'gyur zhing / /'dod pa thams cad ster ba yin/ /zab mo'i chos la nges pa'i bdag /sdig bral snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ /dkon mchog gsum
<p>96a.7</p>gnas don du gnyer/ /chos sbyin pa la zang zing med/ /slob ma sdud pa'i bla ma de/ /sangs rgyas kun zhes sgrub byed ces/ /'gro ba'i mgon gyis bka' stsal te/ /gzhan dag bla ma min par bshad/ /de bas de dang mnyam pa yi/ /mchod bya bla med yod ma
<p>96b</p>
<p>96b.1</p>yin/ /des na 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /brtul zhugs can gyis bla ma mchod/ /de mnyam 'gro ba 'jig rten na/ /khams gsum na ni gzhan med de/ /rdo rje sems nyid 'jig rten na/ /phun tshogs kun phyir zhugs pa yin/ /slob ma phun tshogs mchog 'dod cing / 
<p>96b.2</p>bsod nams mi zad 'dod pa dang / /bdud dang bgegs kun zlog byed pas/ /rnam pa du mas mnyes par bya/ /dam tshig dag ni thams cad kyis/ /bla med dam tshig 'di yin te/ /phun sum tshogs kun ster bas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rtag tu bsrung / /
<p>96b.3</p>zhes pa dang yang bka' stsal pa/ de bas bla ma bsten pa ni/ /yang dag gus ldan slob ma yis/ /yongs su brtag par bya'o zhes/ /rgyal ba'i dam pas rab tu bsngags/ /dkon mchog gsum la dang gis dad/ /sems can kun la snying rjer ldan/ /brten zhing
<p>96b.4</p>gtong sogs yon tan ldan/ /bsod nams thams cad cher bskyed pa/ /byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed/ /blo bzang rab dang yon tan ldan/ /khro ba med cing spro ba che/ /zab mo'i chos la rnam par mos/ /de ni chos kyi sbyin pa dag /zang zing med la rtag par
<p>96b.5</p>dga'/ /de ni rtag tu 'dod pa chung / /tshogs gnyis yang dag bsags pa'o/ /de ni bla mar sangs rgyas dang / /rdo rje 'dzin bcas kun gyis gsungs/ /de nyid sems can thams cad kyi/ /ston pa 'jig rten 'dren pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /yang
<p>96b.6</p>bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa yi/ /bla ma la ni yon dbul zhing / /kun du sna tshogs pad+ma la/ /yon phul bas ni dam pa 'grub/ /gang la gang ni gtang dka' ba/ /de ni mchog tu bshad pa yin/ /gang dang gang ni bsdus pa'i mchog /yang
<p>96b.7</p>na shin tu khyad par can/ /de dang de ni bla ma la/ /de ni mi zad 'dod pas dbul/ /yang na de nyid 'dod gyur pa'am/ /yang na sems la dgongs pa gang / /des sbyin na yang dgos pa bya/ /de ni chung yang mchog yin no/ /gal te de la mchog yod la/ /de yang
<p>97a</p>
<p>97a.1</p>ngan pa'i yon phul na/ /kun gyi slob dpon brnyas pas na/ /des ni rtag tu sdug bsngal thob/ /ces gsungs so/ /yang gsungs pa rigs kyis mdor byas nas bstan par bya ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas dang byang chub
<p>97a.2</p>sems dpa' ji snyed 'khod cing 'tsho ba dang skyong ba de thams cad dus gsum du lhags nas/ slob dpon de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa rnams kyis mchod de/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing der yang 'gro'o/ /ngag rdo rje'i yi ge yang 'di skad brjod do/ /bdag cag de bzhin
<p>97a.3</p>gshegs pa thams cad kyi pa'o/ /bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma'o/ /bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ston pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /'di lta ste dper na/ /rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu na ji snyed bzhugs shing rab tu
<p>97a.4</p>spyod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bsod nams kyi phung po bas kyang slob dpon gyi ba spu'i bu ga gcig 'phags so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes snying
<p>97a.5</p>por gyur pa dang / skye ba'i gnas su gyur pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas yin no zhes 'byung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gtan tshigs gzhan yang yod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du/ /rdo rje slob dpon lus 'di la/ /rgyal ba'i sku
<p>97a.6</p>ni rim bzhin gnas/ /dang po sku yi rdo rje ni/ /gzugs phung la ni rab tu bzhugs/ /rjes su chags pa'i rdo rje ni/ /tshor ba yi ni phung por bzhugs/ /bcom ldan gsung gi rdo rje ni/ /'du shes kyi ni phung por bzhugs/ /mchod pa kun gyi rdo rje ni/ /'du byed kyi ni
<p>97a.7</p>phung por bzhugs/ /bcom ldan 'das thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ /rnam shes phung por yang dag bzhugs/ /'di yi sha sogs sa khams la/ /bcom ldan 'das yum spyan ma bzhugs/ /khrag sogs chu yi khams rnams la/ /bcom ldan 'das yum ma ma bzhugs/ /
<p>97b</p>
<p>97b.1</p>dro ba la sogs me khams la/ /bcom ldan 'das yum gos dkar bzhugs/ /bskyod pa la sogs rlung khams la/ /bcom ldan 'das yum sgrol ma bzhugs/ /de yi mig gi dbang gnyis la/ /de bzhin gshegs pas snying po/ /de yi rna ba'i dbang gnyis
<p>97b.2</p>la/ /bde gshegs phyag na rdo rje'o/ /de yi sna yi dbang gnyis la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mkha' snying bzhugs/ /de yi lce yi dbang bzhugs pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang / /khams bzhi'i rang bzhin gong bu ni/ /rang gi lus zhes bya ming las/ /
<p>97b.3</p>sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'dir bzhugs so/ /de yi yid kyi dbang po la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam dpal bzhugs/ /lus kyi tshigs ni thams cad la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun du bzang / /lus kyi rtsa rgyus thams cad la/ /
<p>97b.4</p>de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa bzhugs/ /lag pa g.yas pa'i rtsa bar ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gshin rje gshed/ /lag pa g.yon pa'i rtsa bar ni/ /bde gshegs gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o/ /kha yi pad+mar bzhugs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rta mgrin no/ /
<p>97b.5</p>gsang ba'i gnas su bzhugs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /dpung pa g.yas par bzhugs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo ba/ /dpung pa g.yon par bzhugs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod pa'i rgyal/ /pus mo g.yas par
<p>97b.6</p>bzhugs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbyug pa sngo/ /pus mo g.yon par bzhugs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa stobs po che/ /rang gi spyi bor bzhugs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor los sgyur/ /rkang pa'i mthil du bzhugs pa ni/ /de bzhin
<p>97b.7</p>gshegs pa gnod mdzes te/ /lus ni 'di nyid kun la 'dir/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs/ /sku yi 'khor lo zhes brjod pa/ /rdo rje slob dpon nyid kyi lus/ /'di dag ma lus rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku rdzogs pa/ /
<p>98a</p>
<p>98a.1</p>rdo rje spyan kun legs bstan pa/ /mya ngan 'das la 'jug pa yin/ /bcom ldan mya ngan 'das myur thob/ /khyod kyi dge ba yongs su smin/ /da ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi/ /lus la rgyal ba thams cad bzhugs/ /nyon cig mthong ba don yod ces/ /phyi
<p>98a.2</p>ma'i dus na sems dpa' che/ /dang po'i las kyi sems can gyis/ /rab tu 'bad de bla ma bkur/ /de tshe mthong ba don yod bcas/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags pa che/ /dga' zhing mgu la rab dang bas/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni mchi ma blags/ /zhes gsungs
<p>98a.3</p>so/ /yang gsungs pa/ tshul khrims dag cing sbyin pa gtong / /bzod dang brtson 'grus mchog dang ldan/ /nyin mtshan rtag tu bsgom la zhen/ /shes rab ldan zhing bzo la mkhas/ /bla ma'i phyir ni yon tan rdzogs/ /dpal ldan slob dpon zhes brjod de/ /nang gi
<p>98a.4</p>gsang ba 'dus pa dga'/ /phyi rol nyan thos las brjod pa/ /de lta'i man ngag rim pa yis/ /slob ma rnams la rjes su slob/ /de ni ston par yongs su shes/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed/ /rtog pa rnams dang dkyil 'khor sogs/ /dam pa'i don gyi bya ba
<p>98a.5</p>dang / slar yang rnam pa gsum dang ni/ /rnal 'byor mchog gi spyod pa la/ /slob cing gzhan la slob tu gzhug /de ni slob dpon zhes bya'o/ /de nyid bcu ni yongs shes nas/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs bya ba shes/ /slob ma rjes su sad nus dang / /gsang ba'i dbang ni
<p>98a.6</p>bskur ba dang / /shes rab snying rjer yang dag ldan/ /rgyud dang man ngag la mi 'jigs/ /zab cing rgya cher yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa mchog /tshar gcod phan 'dogs pa la mkhas/ /de ni rdo rje 'chang du bshad/ /ce'o/ /yang gsungs pa/ 
<p>98a.7</p>rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa la ni bdud kyis glags mi rnyed do/ /dper na dpa' bos bsrungs pa'i bud med la skyes bu 'phyon ma rnams kyis glags mi rnyed do/ /de bzhin du dge ba'i bshes gnyen dpa' bos bsrungs pa'i gang
<p>98b</p>
<p>98b.1</p>zag la bdud sdig can gyis glags mi rnyed do zhe'o/ /yang gsungs pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la bdud kyi las rnams nye bar ston te/ bdud kyi las ni 'di dag yin/ /bdud kyi nyes pa ni 'di dag yin/ /bdud kyi las 'di dag khyod kyis rtogs nas spang bar bya'o zhes
<p>98b.2</p>'byung ngo / /'phags pa rtag tu du'i le'u las kyang / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la phyir mi bsngo bar bya'o/ /'di snyam du bsam par bya ste/ bdag ni thabs la mkhas pa de mi shes kyi 'dis ni thabs la mkhas par rab tu shes so zhes gsungs so/ /
<p>98b.3</p>'phags pa dpal 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa las kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen no/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag las pa la sogs pa gsungs so/ /bdud kyi las rnams spang ba'i phyir/ /bla ma bsten par 'tshal lags na/ /
<p>98b.4</p>yang dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen la/ /bdag cag gang gis brten par bgyi/ /bka' stsal pa/ dad cing bla ma la yang gus/ /rtag tu dge ba'i las la gnas/ /rtog pa ngan pa rnam par spangs/ /lung ni mang du thos pa dang / /gsod pa dang ni 'tshe ba spangs/ /
<p>98b.5</p>sems can rnams ni gdon pa'i blos/ /kun du brtson dang yang dag ldan/ /de la sogs pa'i yon tan ldan/ /dad pa che ba'i slob ma bzang / /zhe'o/ /yang bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar 'ga' zhig grur zhugs pa/ /skya ba 'dzin pa legs thob na/ /mtsho chen pha rol sgrol 'gyur
<p>98b.6</p>gyi/ /gzhan du dogs su phyin mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin bla ma dang mi bral/ /dkon mchog gsum la gus pa dang / /byang chub sems dpa' dad ldan zhing / /'jig rten na ni snying rjer ldan/ /'di ni gru zhes bya bar bshad/ /bla ma mkhas pa skya ba 'dzin/ /gru ni thams cad
<p>98b.7</p>rab ston pa/ /'khor ba'i pha rol 'gro rnams la/ /rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa yin/ /skya ba 'dzin pa med par ni/ /gru yis pha rol bgrod mi nus/ /yon tan thams cad kun rdzogs kyang / /bla ma med par srid mthar min/ /de bas nges pa nyid du ni/ /brtul zhugs
<p>99a</p>
<p>99a.1</p>brtan pas de bzhin du/ /phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyis/ /rtag tu rnal 'byor pas mchod bya/ /phyag la sogs pa'i bya ba kun/ /dus rnams kun du shes par bya/ /shes rab dad par yang dag ldan/ /skye bo rnams la snying rjer ldan/ /khro ba med cing slu
<p>99a.2</p>ba med/ /gtong sogs yon tan rnams kyis brgyan/ /spro tshe rang gi brtson 'grus ldan/ /rtag tu bla ma'i bka' bzhin byed/ /ma bskos yang ni rang gi blos/ /yo byad la sogs dngos po rnams/ /ci rnyed pa dad ci nus pa/ /de bzhin bza' bca' la sogs
<p>99a.3</p>dbul/ /ji ltar brnyas par gyur kyang ni/ /yid ni zhum pa med par bzod/ /slob ma yon tan kun ldan pa/ /lung dang rigs pas rtog pa po/ /ma brtags pa yi rang bzhin can/ /gang yang 'di 'dra med par ni/ /slob ma bya bar mi nus zhes/ /sangs rgyas
<p>99a.4</p>rnams kyis rab tu gsungs/ /ji ltar byis pa rang dgar ni/ /pong ba 'phen pa ji lta bar/ /gang zhig gzhan gyi dbang gyur pa/ /dam pa'i chos kyi snod ma yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /bla ma brnyas shing sgyu can dad pa med/ /sngags kyis rlom zhing glegs
<p>99a.5</p>bam mthong bas khengs/ /dad pa med cing dbang bskur dman pa la/ /gtam gyi rim pa tsam yang brjod mi bya/ /'ga' zhig bla ma la gus dad dang ldan/ /mos pas bsnyen bkur la ni rtag tu brtson/ /thos pas 'dzin gang bla ma dam pa yis/ /bla ma'i drin byin bla
<p>99a.6</p>mas nor mi rtog /ri rab rtse las 'ga' zhig lhung gyur na/ /lhung bar mi bya snyam yang lhung bar 'gyur/ /bla ma'i drin gyis phan pa'i lung thob na/ /grol bar mi 'gyur snyam yang grol bar 'gyur/ /zhes bka' stsal te/ yang gsungs pa/ gang zhig g.yo sgyu blo
<p>99a.7</p>can le lo can/ /nyon mongs bla ma'i skyon mthong yon tan min/ /bla ma la smod dbang bskur thob ces rlom/ /blo dman sems can kun mkhyen thob mi 'gyur/ /bsnyen bkur med par myur du de nyid 'dod/ /log par 'dzin zhes khro bcas g.yo ba dang / /tshogs
<p>99b</p>
<p>99b.1</p>na bla ma mthong na rgyab phyogs shing / /de nas dben par song nas phyag byed pa/ /rang bzhin ngan par gyur pa'i slob ma ni/ /rang bu yin yang gzhan bzhin yongs su spang / /rgyal rigs la sogs mchog las skyes gyur kyang / /bstan pas de ni drung du gzhag mi bya/ /yon
<p>99b.2</p>tan mchog ldan shes rab brtson bcas dang / /yang na bla ma la gus sangs rgyas ltar/ /rgyal ba'i chos rtogs bstan la rab tu dad/ /de ni gnod gyur yin phyir drin sbyin bya/ /rgyud la thos shing lung la legs sbyangs kyang / /bla ma'i bsnyen bkur med cing lung ma thob/ /de ni rang
<p>99b.3</p>la'ang phan med bstan bcos chung / /de ni bstan bcos skye ba'i rgyu tsam yin/ /yang na skal ldan de ni man ngag thob/ /blo gros blun zhing don la sbyor mi nus/ /gzhan don blo yis ston la rab tu 'jug /tshig gi yon tan med na brnyas par 'gyur/ /rgyud mang
<p>99b.4</p>thos shing shes ldan tshig don shes/ /dran dang blo gros 'dzin blo brtson par ldan/ /bla ma'i zhabs bkur bcas shing lung thob dang / /rgyud rgyal man ngag bstan par 'os pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /don 'di rdo rje phreng ba las/ /gsang bar gsungs phyir
<p>99b.5</p>bsdus pa de/ /gdul dka' tshul 'chos sgyu can dang / /rmongs dang sems khro g.yon can dang / /dad med rtog ge ba lhan cig /rtags kyis nye bar mtshon pa dang / /nyan thos dang ni nor la brkam/ /de kho na nyid sun 'byin pa'i/ /don dam pa ni mi shes
<p>99b.6</p>pa/ /med par lta dang tshul khrims 'chal/ /gtam dang tshig ni skyel ba dang / /'dre ba la sogs mi bya zhing / /bla ma dang ni slob ma yi/ /mtshan nyid bstan pa rtogs gyur kyang / /de yis de la ji ltar na/ /gus par bgyi la the tshom mchis/ /mdo rgyud cho gzhib mo dang / 
<p>99b.7</p>bla ma'i zhal nas thos pa yis/ /bdag gi the tshom bsal bar bya/ /rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis nyon/ /gtan tshigs gzhan yang yod pa ste/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /slob ma'i bya ba'i spyod pa ni/ /zhib la sogs bya ba yang / /sngags dang
<p>100a</p>
<p>100a.1</p>rnal 'byor rim pa yis/ /lham dang gdugs dang gtsug tor dang / /so rtsi la sogs myang ba dang / /snabs kyi gong bu mchil ma sogs/ /'dor zhing rkang pa rkyong ba dang / /gzhan du lta dang spyi brtol smra/ /rigs kyis snyems dang ngar 'dzin dang / 
<p>100a.2</p>rgyal la sogs la blta ba dang / /bag med par ni smra ba dang / /bla ma'i gdams ngag mi bsgom pa/ /de la sogs pa'i skyon gyi tshogs/ /bla ma'i mdun du rnam par spang / /'jigs pas thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /spyi bos phyag bya bka' lung nod/ /rang bdog
<p>100a.3</p>kun gtong dam bcas la/ /ngo mtshar bcas shing gdong smad pa/ /slob ma bla ma'i mdun nas bya/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /bla ma'i mdun du slob ma rnams/ /de lta bu sogs spyod shes bya/ /dam tshig sdom pa sngar bshad pa/ /de rnams slob ma'i spyod
<p>100a.4</p>pa'o/ /zhes bka' stsal te/ yang gsungs pa/ yon tan kun gyi gzhir gyur bla ma ni/ /rab tu 'bad de dngos grub 'dod pa dang / /bdud kyi tshogs las rgyal phyir thod bzhin du/ /rang gi spyi bo'i gtsug tu bkur bar bya/ /rgyal ba rnams dang sku gsung thugs
<p>100a.5</p>dang ni/ /yon tan phrin las rab tu mnyam pa'i phyir/ /rtag tu mdun bsams lus dang ngag yid kyis/ /phyag 'tshal tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod do/ /sems can nyam thag gnas nas 'don la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dngos su ston cing dri ma bral la phyag 'tshal
<p>100a.6</p>lo/ /ma lus tshig med yi ge bral la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshegs chen po yis lung ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku gsung thugs ni nyi ma bdud rtsi dang / /nam mkha' lta bur 'gro ba la khyab cing / /yon tan
<p>100a.7</p>phrin las yid bzhin nor la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma khyod la bdag ni rab gnas te/ /bdag gis lus sogs 'byor pa kun 'bul lo/ /dang por phrad na gus par thal sbyar te/ /yan lag lngas btud phyag ni legs par btsal/ /de rjes sa phyogs skyang nul byi dor
<p>100b</p>
<p>100b.1</p>byas/ 'jam pa'i stan ni legs par bting nas kyang / /rgyab rten mdun du chol zangs so shing dang / /zhal dang zhabs bsil dri yi chu dag dang / /spyan lam mi mdzes dngos po spang bar bya/ /gtsang zhing bsod pa'i kha zas legs sbyar nas/ /rin chen snod du ras
<p>100b.2</p>kyis rdul med byas/ /mdun du 'dud byas lag gnyis legs bkru ste/ /gus pa'i tshul du lag pa gnyi gas dbul/ /lag pa'i snod dam bla mas ci gnang ba/ /phyag byas lag pa gnyis kyis legs zhus te/ /gus pa'i spyod lam bstan pas ci bder
<p>100b.3</p>bya/ /de rjes phyag zhabs dri chus rab bsil nas/ /bzang po'i khri stan legs shing mtho ba la/ /gtsang ma'i gos kyis gdong ni rab g.yogs te/ /zhabs rten 'jam po'i khri la bzhugs su gsol/ /rgyab rten dmar po gzer dang bcas pa la/ /steng du bla bre gdugs
<p>100b.4</p>dang yol ba bres/ /chos dang dge ba'i bshes la dkyil 'khor ni/ /tshul dang mthun pa'i ri mo bris pa dbul/ /me tog bdug pa mar me byug pa dang / /zhal zas sil snyan dag gis bstod bya ste/ /gser dang nor bu mu tig be+e DUr+ya/ /spug dang rdo yi snying po dngul
<p>100b.5</p>dag dang / /shaM ka shi la byi ru rin chen shel/ /ras dang dar gos glang chen rta dang ni/ /bu dang bu mo chung ma bran dang 'bru/ /bdag gi 'byor pa stobs kyis dbul bar bya/ /de rjes gus par gsol pa gsum gdab ste/ /'gro la snying rje chen po rab bskyed
<p>100b.6</p>nas/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub yid la bsams nas kyang / /nyon mongs med pa'i sems kyis rna blags te/ /tshul dang mthun pa'i spyod lam bsten par bya/ /chos smras pa la legs par gsungs tshig gis/ /dbang po rab dang tha mar gdams par bya/ /mnyan
<p>100b.7</p>las byung ba'i dge rtsa rgya chen kun/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub phyir ni bsngo bar bya/ /chos smra ba la rigs gzugs thos pa dang / /ngang tshul ngan dang ji ltar brnyas gyur kyang / /chos la brten phyir brnyas pa'i sems mi bya/ /rnyed dang grags dang thos dang tshul
<p>101a</p>
<p>101a.1</p>khrims dang / /gzugs sogs yon tan rnams kyis khengs mi bya/ /shes khe rnyed 'dod phyir ni ma yin te/ /mdor na nyon mongs can sems tshar gcad bya/ /de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog gyur phyir/ /rang gi bla ma yon tan kun rdzogs la/ /
<p>101a.2</p>sgo gsum bsnyen bkur rnam pa mtha' yas phyir/ /bskal par yang ni smra bar su zhig nus/ /mdor bsdus pas ni brjod pa 'di yin te/ /sangs rgyas la sogs rin chen ji bzhin dang / /rang gi pham rang lus rang gces nor/ /rang la gang phangs de bsrung bsgrub pa
<p>101a.3</p>bzhin/ /bla ma dang slob ma'i tshul bstan pa ste le'u dang po'o// //slob mas gsol pa/ bla ma bsnyen bkur bya ba'i tshul ni khong du chud lags na/ /dgos pa gang gi don du bgyi ba bdag la bstan du gsol/ /slob dpon ston pas bka' stsal pa/ 
<p>101a.4</p>'khor ba thog ma med pa nas/ /mi mthun mthun byas gnod byed pa'i/ /bdud bzhi las ni rgyal bya'i phyir/ /'dri ba rgyas par bshad par bya/ /gang gis 'chi med lus mchog ni/ /thob pa yon tan rnams kyi rten/ /gang phyir sems can tshe thung ba/ /'chi
<p>101a.5</p>med go 'phang sgrub mi nus/ /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /'chi ba med pa bsgrub par bya/ /'chi bdag las rgyal 'chi ba med pa de/ /gtan du thob phyir 'gro ba tshe ring bas/ /dam chos bsgrub phyir 'bras bu dpag med la/ /'chi ba 'joms zhes rgyal
<p>101a.6</p>bas rab tu gsungs/ /phyi dang nang gi 'chi ba'i rtags gsungs pa'i/ /mtshan nyid la mkhas 'chi bdag slu ba yi/ /thabs su gyur pa 'bad pa cher byas te/ /'bad pa'i blo la 'bras bu lag na gnas/ /ma rig pa nas rga shi'i mthar thug par/ /skye dang
<p>101a.7</p>'chi ba'i dus ni nges pa med/ /'khor lo bskor ba lta bur rab tu gnas/ /de yi bar chad zhi ba 'chi bdag bslu/ /dbang po lnga la phyi yi rtags 'byung ste/ /drug pa la ni nang du shes par bya/ /'chi bdag nang gi las ni go rims bzhin/ /thabs mkhas ldan
<p>101b</p>
<p>101b.1</p>pas 'chi ba 'joms par 'gyur/ /de dag rnal 'byor gtsug lag gdan bzhi dang / /bde mchog mkha' 'gro dus kyi 'khor lo las/ /gsungs pa mdor bsdus bdag gis khyod la bshad/ /gzhan du ma yengs yid kyis mnyan par gyis/ /mig ni zlum zhing
<p>101b.2</p>gzugs mthong 'khrul pa med/ /gyen du lta dang sa dang nam mkha' yi/ /bu ga chod dang med par snang ba ni/ /'chi bdag 'ong ba mkhas pas shes par bya/ /shing dang ri dang rang gi spyi bor me/ /'bar dang ra man yi grong mthong dang / /dbyug pa gdengs pa nag po
<p>101b.3</p>'bar bar mthong / /chu la dbang po'i gzhu ni ma mthong dang / /grib ma mgo med rang gi lce rtser min/ /tha mal mig la rin chen 'khor lo mthong / /zla bar ri mo med dang nyi ma bzlog /khyi khwa bya rog gtor ma za mi byed/ /bkab pa'i rna bar rnga yi sgra med dang / /sgra mi
<p>101b.4</p>thos dang gnod sbyin sgra grags thos/ /nag po'i gzugs kyis lho phyogs 'dong zhes dang / /dri mi zhim dang dri ldan sna rtse stod/ /glo bur sna ni yo dang zhom pa dang / /ro mi tshor dang ro ni med pa tshor/ /rtsa bar nub dang rtsa ba nag por 'gyur/ /rgyu med ldib pa'i
<p>101b.5</p>tshig 'khrul 'chi ba'i rtags/ /ha phu grang dang dro ba'i reg bya dang / /gzhogs phyed skams dang phyed grang phyed ni dro/ /'jam rtsub lci yang bzlog pa'i lus 'dzin dang / /bshang gci gser dang dngul gyi kha dog dang / /sbring dang dus gcig 'byung dang sdom par byed/ /
<p>101b.6</p>chu dang sa bon 'dres par 'byung ba dang / /'khrig pa spyod tshe dril bu'i sgra thos dang / /nyin dang mtshan mo'i gzugs ni bzlog mthong zhing / /phyogs kyang de bzhin bzlog pa nyid du mthong / /thos pa la sogs de bzhin snang gyur na/ /de ni 'chi bdag dbang du song zhes
<p>101b.7</p>bya/ /bshang gci med dang mang gyur 'chi ba'i rtags/ /glo bur zha dang sbeg dang rgyu med tsho/ /stobs med ha cang stobs dang ldan pa dang / /dri zhim dri mi zhim pas lus la ni/ /srog chags 'du dang 'bros pa 'chi ba'i rtags/ /gnyen gyis 'dor dang dgra ni byams
<p>102a</p>
<p>102a.1</p>pa dang / /dud mo skra 'bal bsam gtan khad pa 'dor/ /grib gnon lus la yang yang 'jug pa dang / /lag mthil rkang pa de bzhin tsha dang 'bigs/ /chu sbugs lcags bsregs bzhin du myur du skam/ /lkog mar 'brum pa dmar po 'byung ba dang / /
<p>102a.2</p>glo bur mtshan ma nub par gyur dang 'phyangs/ /de la sogs pa lus kyi rtags shes bya/ /thams cad sems kyi dbang du byed pa ste/ /sems las ma gtogs don gzhan med par gsungs/ /de phyir rang sems brtag pa ma gtogs pa'i/ /phyi rol don ni thams cad
<p>102a.3</p>'khrul kyang snang / /rnal 'byor pa ni shin tu khro bar 'dod/ /lhag par chags dang lhag par gnyid che dang / /rab tu mi dga' kyi hud smre sngags 'don/ /ha cang dga' dang mngon shes thob snyam dang / /mkha' la 'phur snyam ting 'dzin thob snyam dang / /dmigs pa
<p>102a.4</p>brjed dang de la yid mi 'gro/ /nang gi nyi zla'i rlung ni log pa dang / /lhag dang chad dang ha cang 'phel dang 'grib/ /dus su min dang ha cang thag ring dran/ /phug dang mun pa bug pa la sogs sems/ /'jig rten pa ni brgya dang drug cur dran/ /'jig rten 'das las sems
<p>102a.5</p>ni log pa dang / /rnyed dang nyo tshong gnyen gyi bya ba dang / /lus dang zas kyi cha sgeg 'dun pa dang / /'khor dang bsod snyoms ster la mngon par dga'/ /grags pa'i gtam dang rab byung khyim pa dang / /mang por 'dre dang bdag gi bde ba 'dod/ /'khor 'dod 'khor
<p>102a.6</p>la ha cang mi dga' dang / /bsgom dang bzlas dang sbyin sreg tshogs 'khor ro/ /sngon du byed pa las ni nyams pa dang / /ma byin pa dang yul pa'i gtam la dga'/ /gnyen dang 'brug dang rgyal po'i 'thab mo dang / /dug dang byang stems ma mo'i sbod gtong dang / /gzhon nu'i
<p>102a.7</p>sbyor dang bsad dang bsad dbang med/ /sa bdag dang ni mi yi bdag po dang / /gdon dang 'dre can gnas la chags pa dang / /srog chags gdug dang g.yang sa'i lam gnas pa'i/ /rnal 'byor pa ni 'chi ba myur du 'thob/ /rang gi sems ni yongs su gyur pa'i phyir/ /
<p>102b</p>
<p>102b.1</p>'khrul kyang rmi lam khyad du gsad mi bya/ /thub pa'i dbang pos chos kun rmi 'drar gsungs/ /de phyir rlung sogs ma yin rtags kyis kyang / /rmi lam na ni dus mtshan nag mo mthong / /de la chags spyod de yi dbang gyur dang / /shing la 'dzegs dang shing dang ri las lhung / /
<p>102b.2</p>bong bu rnga mos lho dang shar phyogs dang / /spre'u zhon pas shar du 'gro ba dang / /shing ring thal phung grog mkhar srog shing 'dzeg /ka ra bI ra'i phreng thogs dri tshogs byugs/ /thog dang ser ba rdo ba'i char pas non/ /sngar shi'i mi dang 'grogs dang lam du zhugs/ /yan
<p>102b.3</p>lag lcags sgrog ldan dang gzeb tu bcug /gos med gos dang rgyan phreng dmar po thogs/ /de la sogs pa 'chi ltas rnam par 'gyur/ /tha mal rtags su de ltar bshad pa ste/ /'byung ba rlung sogs nang ni rnam gnyis gzhan/ /'chi bdag sde rnams gzhom phyir
<p>102b.4</p>sngags dang ni/ /sman dang bsam gtan rin chen rnams kyis so/ /'byung po'i gdon la sngags kyis bsrung ba ste/ /'byung ba 'khrug pa la ni sman gyis gso/ /nang gi rlung la ting 'dzin stobs kyis te/ /gdug pa rnams la tshe yi nor bus so/ /gnod 'joms
<p>102b.5</p>sman ni gang dang gang bshad pa/ /gang du gcig gis thams cad 'grub par bshad/ /de dag bsdus pa'i stobs las byung shes nas/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis rab tu brtag par bya/ /'chi bdag gzhom pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //'khor bar srog ni yun
<p>102b.6</p>ring gnas gyur kyang / /bgegs kyis bsod nams ma lus zad byas pas/ /yon tan rnams ni 'grub par mi 'gyur bas/ /bgegs rnams bzlog phyir bsrung ba chen po bya/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs pa mchog
<p>102b.7</p>dang dpung bzangs la sogs su/ /lta ba'i gdon ni gang dang gang bshad pa/ /sde dpon 'khor dang de yi rigs su gtogs/ /sa stengs mi la rtag tu 'tshe bar byed/ /de dag bzlog phyir gnas dang mtshan nyid dang / /bsrung dang dengs par bya phyir ngas bshad do/ /dge
<p>103a</p>
<p>103a.1</p>ba'i bshes la gus pa cher bskyed la/ /'gro la phan phyir nyon la yid la zung / /sgrub pa po yi sems la rab zhugs nas/ /rab tu 'bad de bar chad byed pa ni/ /lha yi bu ni tshangs pa la sogs pa'i/ /phyogs bcu skyong ba'i lha las grangs 'dra ba/ /tshangs
<p>103a.2</p>pa'i srin po dang ni 'dod pa'i lha/ /gzugs med lhas ni bar chad byed pa min/ /glang chen gdong dang pad+ma'i phreng la sogs/ /ded dpon bcus ni gnod pa rab tu byed/ /ris su gtogs pa bgegs rigs stong phrag ni/ /brgyad cu mi la 'tshe bar byed pa ste/ /tshangs
<p>103a.3</p>pa la sogs lha ni steng gi phyogs/ /'og na 'dug pa sa dang klu yi ste/ /shar phyogs na ni dri za'i rigs rnams te/ /lho ni grul bum nub na klu yi rigs/ /byang du gnod sbyin shar du dbang po dang / /lhor ni gshin rje nub tu chu yi bdag /byang du gnod sbyin shar lhor
<p>103a.4</p>byin za'o/ /lho nub bden bral nub byang sprin gyi sgra/ /byang shar mtshams su dbang ldan gnas pa ste/ /bdud rnams phyogs ni bcu po rab tu bsrung / /de dag thar par 'bad la bgegs byed do/ /rang gi spyod yul las ni 'da' snyam sems/ /bsod nams gzi
<p>103a.5</p>ni lus la 'jug byed de/ /'khor dang rnyed dang grags dang snyan pa dang / /'jig rten pa yi bsam gtan skyed par byed/ /de yi sems kyis gzengs ni bstod byas pas/ /skye bo phal chen dbang du sdud byed cing / /bsod nams dngos po la ni rab tu 'jog /ye
<p>103a.6</p>shes tshogs la mngon par mi dga' zhing / /'khor bar 'dren pa'i gtam la rtag tu brtson/ /kha cig mngon shes thob phyir gzugs rnams mthong / /ting 'dzin dpag med mngon du gyur snyam dang / /sangs rgyas zhing du 'ga' zhig lung bstan thob/ /'gro ba'i
<p>103a.7</p>don du kun du 'gro bar rig /sgra dang 'od 'byung nam mkha' gzugs kyang ston/ /me tog 'thor zhing sngon gyi spyod tshul dang / /da lta ma 'ongs lung ni ston par byed/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni mang por rab ston cing / /mya ngan 'das la mchog gzhol lung yang ston/ /de yis gzhan
<p>103b</p>
<p>103b.1</p>gyi sems ni rab bskul te/ /sbyin sogs rgya chen gus pa rgya chen yang / /kha cig la ni 'dun pa zlog byed cing / /zas dang gos med ting 'dzin las nyams byed/ /'dod chags can la 'dod pa skyed byed cing / /khro 'dod khro byed la rmongs lhag par rmongs/ /rlung can
<p>103b.2</p>lus la rlung du 'jug byed cing / /mkhris sogs nad can rnams la de bskyed de/ /kha cig sems g.yeng ting 'dzin thob mi byed/ /kha cig thos las nyams byed dman par bsgyur/ /kha cig la ni rgyal ba'i skur ston cing / /gzhan las rgyal sras nyan thos gzhan dag las/ /
<p>103b.3</p>mkhan po slob dpon lhan cig gnas pa dang / /nye gnas tshul gyis dge las zlog par byed/ /kha cig la ni pha ma spun zla dang / /sring mo chung ma byi mo snying nye dran/ /kha cig la ni lha yi cha byad dang / /lha mo'i cha lugs skra ni rab tu gnag /nu ma pho long mig ni ri
<p>103b.4</p>dwags 'dra/ /glang chen brla 'dra rked pa rdo rje bzhin/ /chags pa'i mtshan ma rab tu ston byed pas/ /rnal 'byor pa yi sems ni shing bal bzhin/ /de dag sems kyis kha cig mnar sems rgyu'i/ /tshig gi zhe sdang me ni shing skam bzhin/ /kha cig la ni bya dang mi bya ba/ /
<p>103b.5</p>mi shes phyir na mun par gzugs bzhin te/ /kha cig 'byung po drag po'i cha byad can/ /mtshon cha 'bar dang sdigs mdzub bsdigs par byed/ /kha cig la ni 'dod pa lnga stobs shing / /kha cig la ni grags sogs 'jig rten chos/ /gzhan la thos sogs la lar 'byor
<p>103b.6</p>ba'i stobs/ /la la la ni thog dang ser ba 'bebs/ /kha cig ting 'dzin las bzlog tshul khrims dang / /de las bzlog nas la la sbyin la 'god/ /la la bsam gtan las bzlog 'chad pa dang / /'chang ba po ni zhal ta'i las la sbyor/ /la la rab tu byung
<p>103b.7</p>ba khyim gnas la/ /theg chen las bzlog nyan thos theg la 'dzud/ /bslab gsum gnas las gzhan ni bzlog nas su/ /mchod rten la sogs bsod nams che la dgod/ /la la bsam gtan khang par sgra 'byin cing / /sgo nas 'jigs pa'i sgra 'byung cho
<p>104a</p>
<p>104a.1</p>nges 'debs/ /mnyam gzhag ming nas 'bod cing rab tu dgod/ /sgyugs pa glu len pheg rdob dung gi sgra/ /se gol gtogs 'dra 'khun dang sen mo'i dri/ /'dar dang dngangs pa glo bur skyed byed cing / /mi sdug gzugs ston rdeg dang 'phul ba dang / /
<p>104a.2</p>bsam gtan mi dga' lus ni yang dang ljid/ /rgyu med gcig pur smra dad dgod dang khro/ /glo bur du ni gzhan gyi sems shes shing / /'jigs pa'i skar mda' 'od zer me 'bar dang / /dman pa'i man ngag ston pa'i 'dod lha bzhin/ /la lar bdag ni myur du 'chi snyam
<p>104a.3</p>dang / /bsam gtan 'grub par mi nus thos sogs yin/ /da ni ci bya 'bras bu ma thob cing / /dman pas yi chad sgyid ni lug par byed/ /kha cig ma brtags brtson la 'jog byed de/ /bar dor nyams pas 'bras bu med par byed/ /gzhan dag gang byed de las
<p>104a.4</p>zlog byed de/ /de dang de med 'bras bu de bor bzhin/ /kha cig cho ga nyams la sbyor byed de/ /'bad pa byas kyang de don 'grub mi 'gyur/ /la la 'gro ba mi 'dod la gnas pas/ /thar dad 'chi ba'i gnas ni des mi shes/ /mdor na ngang gi la ni theg chen la/ /zhugs pa'i
<p>104a.5</p>ting 'dzin la sogs bar chad byed/ /srog dang dngos grub gnyis ka 'phrog pa'i phyir/ /bla ma'i lung gis bzlog pa tshogs dang bral/ /bla ma'i ngag med sgrub pa la 'jug pa/ /srog dang dngos grub bgegs kyis 'phrog byed de/ /bgegs kyi sbyor ba stong phrag
<p>104a.6</p>brgyad cu sogs/ /brjod par mi nus 'on kyang mdor bshad do/ /bsod nams bsags pa'i lus la gdon dang ni/ /de yi rigs kyis gnod par mi rigs kyang / /sngon chad byas pa'i las kyi nus pa dang / /'phral gyi rkyen gyi gnod pa 'byung ba srid/ /las
<p>104a.7</p>kyi nyon mongs stobs kyi nus skyed de/ /de phyir nyon mongs bzlog pas de med 'gyur/ /'byung ba 'khrugs sogs rkyen las gang byung ba/ /gso ba rig pa las ni shes par byed/ /rkyen dang gzhan gnod 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur pa/ /sgrub pa'i sa gzhi legs
<p>104b</p>
<p>104b.1</p>par ma sbyangs shing / /bsrung ba'i cho ga tshul bzhin ma byas pas/ /bgegs kyi bar chad dag ni byed par 'gyur/ /gnyug mar gnas pa'i 'byung po la 'tshe dang / /yi dwags rnams la gtor ma sbyin mi byed/ /'dre la sogs pa lha bzhin mchod byed cing / /dkon
<p>104b.2</p>mchog gsum dang bral na bgegs 'byung 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi rig sngags gcod par byed pa dang / /bgegs la phur bus 'debs dang sbod gtong byed/ /dbang ma thob dang lung med log zhugs la/ /bgegs ni rtag tu 'tshe bar byed pa yin/ /byams sogs dang
<p>104b.3</p>bral gsang sngags drag zlos dang / /rang gi dam tshig las nyams gdug sems can/ /klu yi gnas su sbyin sreg byed pa dang / /bshang dang gci dang 'khrig spyod srog chags gsod/ /nub tu kha bltas chu mig se skyer ldan/ /drag po chags pa'i rdo bzlog
<p>104b.4</p>shing gcig gcod/ /thab gtong byed pa klu yis brlag 'gyur te/ /byang du kha bltas pa yang de bzhin no/ /sngags pa sgrub khang sgo ni lhor bstan dang / /nub tu sngas bstan dad lha mi sgrub dang / /bla ma dge slong lha khang phyag mi byed/ /de dag rnams dang pha dang ma yi
<p>104b.5</p>ni/ /gong du 'gro la gdon gyi gnas skabs rnyed/ /mi ro gnas klu sa dur thal phung dang / /lha khang sgo dang ri sna chu yi mdor/ /nyal bar byed la bgegs ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gcig pu 'gro dang mtshan 'gros byed pa dang / /gzhan la 'tshe ba'i bsam pa rtag ldan
<p>104b.6</p>zhing / /rang gi srung bsgrub las la mi brtson zhing / /de la gdon ni rab tu 'byung bar bshad/ /gsang sngags zlos pas mdze po rme can dang / /rta rgyug lcag gzhu rnams dang la phug dang / /chang dang chang 'dra rnams ni spang bar bya/ /de dag byas pas gsang sngags
<p>104b.7</p>mi 'grub la/ /de ma grub phyir gdon ni 'jug par 'gyur/ /dpung bzangs zhus pa'i dam tshig la gnas grol/ /rgyud gzhan las 'byung bzlog pa'i cho ga ni/ /bstan par bya yis rab tu gus pas nyon/ /rang sems snang phyir sngags dang cho ga spyad/ /byams
<p>105a</p>
<p>105a.1</p>la sogs pas rnal 'byor bsrung byas la/ /bsod nams la sogs tshogs kyis bdag bsrung bya/ /hUM las byung ba'i gnas ni kun du bsrung / /de rjes khro bo la sogs skur bsgoms te/ /chog rdzogs pas yongs su sbyang bar bya/ /rdo rje rigs
<p>105a.2</p>gtso pho nya ma yi tshogs/ /rigs pa mang po bsten pa'i lha mo de/ /bzlas pa tsam gyis bgegs rnams phung ba dang / /rngam pa 'don zhing phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyur/ /ye shes gzugs can khro bo bcu yis ni/ /phyogs skyong bcu po dbang du byas pas
<p>105a.3</p>kyang / /bgegs kyi sbyor ba ma lus zhi bar 'gyur/ /byams sems thob pas bdag la srung bar byed/ /ye shes me yi 'od zer 'phro 'du yis/ /seng ge'i gzugs can sngags kyi phreng ba yi/ /rab tu 'khor ba'i bzlas pa byas pas kyang / /bgegs rnams
<p>105a.4</p>lus ni rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur/ /gru gsum re pha'i sa bon las skyes pa'i/ /'bar ba'i nang du ting 'dzin 'od kyis bkug /til bsregs bzhin du thal bar byas pas kyang / /sbyor ba ma lus rlag par byed par bshad/ /hUM skyes rdo rje ra ba 'od
<p>105a.5</p>dang bcas/ /sa gzhi rdo rje'i rgyal por rab sprul te/ /me 'bar nang gi lha yi 'khor gyis bsrung / /bgegs kyis mthong bar mi 'gyur 'ong mi 'gyur/ /hUM skyes rnam par snang mdzad gzhal yas su/ /ye shes 'od zer yi ge'i sgras bskul nas/ /
<p>105a.6</p>'chi med lus la drangs pas bgegs kyis ni/ /sbyor ba ma lus snang mdzad sgo nas 'byed/ /hUM las byung ba'i bdud rtsi'i zas bsten pas/ /rdo rje mi 'chi lus thob bgegs med de/ /me yi lce la phye ma leb bzhin du/ /thal bar gyur nas nam mkhar
<p>105a.7</p>dengs par bya/ /rdo rje'i go cha ya lad mtshon thogs nas/ /bdud kyi dpa' bo rnams ni 'byer bar 'gyur/ /byams pa'i go bgos snying rje'i mtshon thogs te/ /dga' ba'i dpa' sems byang chub sems kyis ni/ /rta zhon btang snyoms kyis ni g.yul 'gyed
<p>105b</p>
<p>105b.1</p>pas/ /zhe sdang las byung bgegs kyi g.yul chen 'joms/ /stong pa nyid la rang gi blo gnas te/ /snang ba rnam rtog las skyes shes byas nas/ /dngos med chos kyi rang bzhin bsgom pa yis/ /rnam rtog las byung bdud ni med par 'gyur/ /lha la sogs pa'i
