<p>105b.2</p>bdud gzhom pa ste le'u gsum pa'o// //nyon mongs bdud ni gzhom par ma byas par/ /lha la sogs pa'i bdud bzlog mi 'gyur bas/ /me mi 'dod pas shing ni spong ba ltar/ /nyon mongs bdud ni bzlog phyir 'bad par bya/ /gnas pa rnam pa gsum
<p>105b.3</p>ni rab gnas pas/ /nyes pa rnams ni rab 'joms lung nyid las/ /thub pa'i dbang pos rgyud las gsungs pa bzhin/ /rab tu bstan gyis rab tu gus pas nyon/ /'dod chags shas cher mi gtsang sha tshil dang / /pags pa keng rus lha bas rnam par bzlog /
<p>105b.4</p>lus ni mi gtsang pags pa sha khrag rkang / /glad rgyas rgyu ma mtsher mchin mkhal ma khrag /mkhris pa bad kan khu chu phyi sa dang / /gcin rnams ba sbu sgo dang rus pa dang / /mig dang rna ba sna dang kha dang ni/ /bshang sgo mtshan dang bu ga dgu pa yi/ /rma nas dri ma sna tshogs
<p>105b.5</p>mi gtsang ba'i/ /'dzag pa'i rgyun ni rtag par 'byung ba yin/ /de ltar yan lag thams cad 'dus pa dang / /sa chu me rlung nam mkha' rnams dang ldan/ /ji bzhin las kyi rjes 'brang mi yi lus/ /thams cad ldan pa'i lus la gnas pa yin/ /'dod chags kyis
<p>105b.6</p>ni gdungs par gyur na yang / /lus kyi yan lag 'di dag thams cad la/ /dran pa rtse gcig mngon du byas nas ni/ /ye shes mig gis so sor rnam par brtag /de ltar gang zhig nges par brtag pa dang / /lus dang srog la rjes su chags pa yis/ /'dod chags rtsa
<p>105b.7</p>nas yong ye zhi gyur te/ /nyi mas mun nag gtan nas bsal ba bzhin/ /'tshol dang mdza' bshes dang ni rnam par bral/ /mi sdug pa dang phrad cing 'dod pas gdungs/ /na ba skye rga 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal can/ /yul rnams kun du song na'ang de med min/ /sha sbrang tsha
<p>106a</p>
<p>106a.1</p>grang bkres dang skom la sogs/ /gang du sod na'ang sdug bsngal nyid yin pas/ /yul mngon dga' ba'i sems ni byung bas na/ /rnam rtog de dag rnam par bzlog par bya/ /sems ni glog dang spre'u dang sprin dang mtshungs/ /de bzhin rgya mtsho chen po'i rlabs dang
<p>106a.2</p>'dra/ /rgyu mtshan 'dong rgyur yul la mngon par dga'/ /g.yo zhing 'phrin pas nges par gdul bar bya/ /de phyir bcom ldan rgyal ba'i dbang po yis/ /chos 'di kun gyi rtsa ba sems zhes gsungs/ /sems dang bas ni lha mi'i bde ba dang / /mtho ris dang ni byang
<p>106a.3</p>grol thob par 'gyur/ /sems kyi skyon gyis dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / /sems dmyal gnas shing mi sdug thob par 'gyur/ /sems de rab tu dang bar gyur pa yis/ /sa chu me rlung skye rga 'chi sogs dang / /bar dang tha mar gnod pa kun dang bral/ /rnam
<p>106a.4</p>grol bde zhing zhib thob par 'gyur/ /gsang sngags dngos grub kun dang thun mong ba/ /bde ba chung zhing bde ba brgyad dang bral/ /nyon mongs dug bcas rnam par 'jig 'gyur ba/ /dang ba'i sems kyis thob bar bya ba yin/ /'dod rgyal las kyang ma byung dus
<p>106a.5</p>las min/ /rang bzhin dbang phyug las kyang ma yin te/ /rgyu med rkyen min skyes bus ma byas kyang / /las dang nyon mongs pa las sems can byung / /gzugs ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ldan/ /de ni bdag min bdag kyang gzugs ma yin/ /gzugs la
<p>106a.6</p>bdag med bdag la gzugs med de/ /gzugs ni stong pa'i phung bzhir rig par gyis/ /gzugs ni dbu ba rdos pa dag dang 'dra/ /tshor ba chu bur bzhin du rtag tu med/ /de ltar mthong ba lta ba bzang po yin/ /gang zhig gzhan gyur de ni lta ngan gsungs/ /
<p>106a.7</p>tshig rtsub 'khyal pa smra ba smra ba dang / /gzhan gyi bud med bgrod dang brdzun smra dang / /rku dang gzhan gyi srog gcod gnod byed dang / /chang dang byed pa rtag tu spang bar bya/ /rmongs pa gang zhig lus dang ngag dang ni/ /de bzhin yid kyis bsod nams/ 
<p>106b</p>
<p>106b.1</p>bsags byas kyang / /thams cad log par lta ba bcom pas na/ /de yi rnam smin mi 'dod 'bras bur 'gyur/ /dper na sa dang chu dang dus ldan yang / /sa bon tshig las myu gu mi skye ltar/ /de bzhin mi shes log ltas bcom pa yi/ /sems la dge ba'i chos
<p>106b.2</p>rnams mi skye'o/ /rtag tu sems ni dge ba bcu dag gis/ /chos kyi lam la gnas par byas na legs/ /ser sna dregs dang rgyags pa rnam par spangs/ /gang zhig dgra bcom pha ma gsod pa dang / /mthun pa'i dge 'dun dbyen ni byed pa dang / /de bzhin
<p>106b.3</p>gshegs la sdang ba'i sems kyis su/ /gang zhig mi dag sku mtshal 'byin byed pa/ /shin tu mi bzad pa yi las 'di rnams/ /rgyal bas mtshams med lnga po bsten par bshad/ /gti mug gis ni sdig pa ci byas na/ /phung po 'di la grub pa thob mi
<p>106b.4</p>'gyur/ /mchod rten 'jig cing byang chub sems dpa' gsod/ /nyon mongs zad pa ma ni sun 'byin dang / /slob ma gsod cing dge 'dun mnga' ba la/ /'dod pas mang nyung sku 'phrog byed pa dang / /mtshams med nyer lnga de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /
<p>106b.5</p>tshul nyams mi ni gang zhig 'di byed pa/ /bskal pa'i bar du mnar med sdug bsngal myong / /gsang sngags dngos grub sgrub kyang yong mi 'thob/ /gang zhig bde gshegs gsung gi glegs bam dag /chud gzon pa'am mes ni bsreg pa'am/ /bsam pa dran
<p>106b.6</p>pas chur ni 'dor ba dang / /yang na chos kyi sku ni spong ba dang / /bslab tshig ma lus pas ni brgyan pa yi/ /dge slong dag dang dge slong ma gsod dang / /dge bsnyen dag dang dge bsnyen ma gsod dang / /ngan pa'i sems kyis lha khang bsreg kyang rung / /mi yi
<p>106b.7</p>yul na sdig pa 'di byas pas/ /dka' ba spyod pa ldan pa grub mi mthong / /gang zhig dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed pa'i/ /bsam pas gnod pa cung zad byas kyang rung / /bdag nyid mnar med yun ring dmyal bar gnas/ /de nas thar nas las kyi dbang
<p>107a</p>
<p>107a.1</p>gis ni/ /rigs ngan mi dang dud 'gro'i skye ba thob/ /ngas ni 'di dag khyed la mdor bshad do/ /gang zhig mi bzad las byed thub pa gsod/ /rigs sngags gcod dang gnod par byed pa dang / /bsam pa ngan pas rig sngags tshogs mi 'chang / /
<p>107a.2</p>don med bzhin du sen mos rtswa gcod dang / /rkang pas ske ba nyed pa la sogs pa'i/ /sna 'bigs dge 'dun la ni mi gus dang / /'byung por byin pa'am lha bshos gtor ma 'am/ /sa la lhung ba sngags pas bza' mi bya/ /'dod chags zil gyis gnon pas dud
<p>107a.3</p>'gro dang / /bud med bgrod bya min pa bgrod mi bya/ /glang chen mi gdul sbrul yang mi gzung zhing / /rtag rgyug pa dang lcag gis gzhu mi bya/ /gang zhig sems can nad dang sdug bsngal la/ /byams pa'i bsam pa brtan po med pa dang / /las de rnams dang ldan
<p>107a.4</p>par gyur pa de/ /dngos grub nam yang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /dper na nam mkha' thug pa med pa las/ /'dom gyis gzhal bas mtha' rtogs mi nus ltar/ /de bzhin dkon mchog gsum la brten nas ni/ /phan gnod byas pa'i dge sdig mtha' mi rtogs/ /
<p>107a.5</p>rgya dang rnyi stor rtsa ba'i dug dag gis/ /khyi la sogs pa'i sems can gsod pa dang / /bya rgod la sogs gzeb kyis bcing byas na/ /'di dang pha rol dag tu grub mi 'thob/ /bdud dgra'i me tog rnying pa bor ba rnams/ /rkang pas mi brdzi mgo la gdags mi
<p>107a.6</p>bya/ /bkres par gyur kyang de dag rnams la ni/ /phul ba'i lha bshos nam yang bza' mi bya/ /dge dang mi dge'i bshes pa bzung na ni/ /bram ze dmangs rigs dag la khyad par med/ /'on kyang 'gro ba'i blos ni bram ze dang / /'di ni dmangs rigs yin zhes
<p>107a.7</p>btags par zad/ /bden pa'i lam dmigs dge ba'i rjes 'brangs na/ /dmangs rigs dag kyang skye shi med par 'gro/ /log pa'i lam zhugs pa yi spyod ldan na/ /bram ze yin yang mi bzad dmyal bar 'gro/ /lus can shin tu dri ma ldan pa dag /'di na gzhan
<p>107b</p>
<p>107b.1</p>gyis dag par mi 'gyur te/ /de ni sdig pa rnam par bsal ba dang / /bsod nams ma lus yongs su bzung bas 'dag /de ltar sdig pa'i chos las rnam grol na/ /bde bar gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa'i chos/ /dag cing grol ba dang ni ldan gyur pa/ /
<p>107b.2</p>bzlas pas skyon mdo sde bklag par bya/ /gtsang zhing dben pa'i sa phyogs dag tu ni/ /'jim pa'am bye ma'i las las byas pa yis/ /bde gshegs mchod rten rten 'brel snying po can/ /sdig pa sbyang ba'i phyir ni rtag tu gdab/ /ring bsrel can gyi gzugs
<p>107b.3</p>sku'am mchod rten la/ /bstod cing dri dang phreng ba mar me dbul/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan rol mo dang / /mchog tu dad pa yis ni dbul bar bya/ /ji ltar chu klung nyin mtshan rtag par ni/ /rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab par 'gyur ba ltar/ /de bzhin phyag
<p>107b.4</p>bcas bzlas dang brtul zhugs kyis/ /bsod nams ma lus par ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar sbyin sreg dang ni bzlas brjod kyis/ /gsang sngags bsgrags dang dngos grub ma thob na/ /'jim pa la ni mchod rten 'bum btab bam/ /yang na chu 'gram bye ma dag
<p>107b.5</p>la gdab/ /des ni de yi sdig pa srid gzhan la/ /byas pa gang yin de ni zad gyur nas/ /des ni gsang sngags mthu yis 'di nyid la/ /mthong ba'i chos la bsod nams 'bras bu 'thob/ /de yis bde bar gshegs la dad bskyed nas/ /de bzhin du ni byang chub
<p>107b.6</p>sems kyang bskyed/ /rdo rje'i rigs zhes brjod pa rgya chen dang / /nga la yang ni dad cing dga' bar byas/ /grags dang ma grags rnyed dang ma rnyed dang / /bde dang sdug bsngal de bzhin bstod dang smad/ /sems kyis 'jig rten chos rnams rab bcom ste/ /sdig pa'i
<p>107b.7</p>gnas su gyur pa spang bar bya/ /dper na rgya mtsho skad cig tsam yang ni/ /mi yi ro dang lhan cig mi gnas ltar/ /de bzhin rnam rtog sems kyis sdig byas pa/ /sngags pas skad cig tsam yang gnas mi bya/ /byams dang snying rje'i chus gdab zhe sdang la/ /re zhig
<p>108a</p>
<p>108a.1</p>cig na dgra yang mdza' bor 'gyur/ /mdza' bo dag kyang dgrar ni 'gyur ba nyid/ /de bzhin kha cig kyang ni bar mar 'gyur/ /bar ma de nyid kyang ni dgra bor 'gyur/ /de ltar mdza' bshes 'gyur bar rig bya ste/ /blo gros ldan pas nam yang chags mi
<p>108a.2</p>bya/ /gnyen la dga' ba'i sems dag rnam rtog dang / /bzlog nas dge la ci bder gnas par bya/ /le lo 'dod chags mi dge ldan pa'i sems/ /gang nas gang du g.yeng zhing rgyu ba dag /de dang de ni myur du bzlog nas ni/ /gsang sngags yi ge mchod la legs
<p>108a.3</p>par sbyar/ /dkon mchog gsum la dad pa brtan por bya/ /sos ka'i nags me mched pa'i me lce yis/ /ma bsgrims bzhin du tshang tshing kun bsregs ltar/ /bzlas brjod me la tshul khrims rlung gis sbar/ /brtson 'grus chen po'i me lces sdig pa sreg /
<p>108a.4</p>me tog dri bstod mar me phul ba dang / /tshul khrims brtson 'grus dka' thub byas pa yis/ /dge ba de kun bla na med pa yi/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bla med mchog tu bsdo/ /dper na chu klung rgya mtshor phyin pa na/ /lan tshwa'i ror ni gcig tu 'gyur ba bzhin/ /de
<p>108a.5</p>ltar bla med byang chub mchog bsngos pa'i/ /bsod nams rgyal ba'i ror ni gcig tu 'gyur/ /dper na skyes bu la las 'bras bu'i phyir/ /sA lu bskyed kyi sog ma'i phyir min yang / /sA lu bskyed nas sgrim pa med par ni/ /sog ma'i phung po zhor las
<p>108a.6</p>'byung ba bzhin/ /de bzhin byang chub 'bras bu 'dod pa'i phyir/ /bsod nams sgrub kyi longs spyod phyir min yang / /sog ma'i phung po dag dang mtshungs par ni/ /ma bsgrubs bzhin du mi yi longs spyod 'grub/ /tshe ring ba 'di legs par thob pa dang / /tshul
<p>108a.7</p>bzhin bsgrub pa'i yul dag rnyed pa'am/ /skye ba med par gyur cing 'gro ba yi/ /bsam pa rnams ni rtag tu rdzogs par bya/ /'greng dang 'dug dang gnyid log nyal ba dang / /mgo 'phres za klog bzlas brjod byed pa na/ /rjes su dran drug so so'i yon tan dang / /rig
<p>108b</p>
<p>108b.1</p>pa bcas te rjes su dran par bya/ /bde gshegs chos dang dge 'dun bcas dran te/ /shA ri'i bu dang nga la thal sbyar 'dud nas nyal/ /de ltar bsam pa'i dge ba mtha' dag zad/ /lha la sogs dang bgegs dang log 'dren rnams/ /brtul zhugs gnas pa de la
<p>108b.2</p>glags mi lta/ /dper na lo thog thams cad sa dag la/ /brten nas skyon med par ni skye ba ltar/ /de bzhin tshul khrims bsten nas chos dkar mchog /snying rje'i chus brlan pa ni rnam par skye/ /rgyal ba ngas gsungs so sor thar pa yi/ /tshul khrims
<p>108b.3</p>rnam dag 'dul ba ma lus las/ /sngags pa khyim pas rtags dang cho ga spang / /lhag ma rnams ni nyams su blang bar bya/ /lha yi bde ba dang ni 'byor pa dang / /tshe dang stobs gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / /thos mang mdangs bzang gcig tu yid gzhungs
<p>108b.4</p>dang / /dbang thang che kun dka' thub stobs kyis 'thob/ /gang gi tshe na sems ni dang ba yis/ /mi yi yul na byang chub sems blangs pa/ /de ni phyin chad lha dang lha min dang / /'jig rten ma lus rnams kyis phyag bya'o/ /mis ni mngon par mtho ba
<p>108b.5</p>ma lus pa'i/ /bslab pa mtha' dag blangs par gyur pa dang / /sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin pa dang / /dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yang bsabs pa yis/ /ji ltar gangs la nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis/ /gdungs na gzi brjid mi bzod 'ju ba ltar/ /
<p>108b.6</p>tshul khrims nyi ma'i 'od zer bzlas brjod kyis/ /gdungs na sdig pa'i gangs kyang zad par 'gyur/ /mun nag smag la mar me byung ba yis/ /mun nag ma lus sel bar byed pa ltar/ /tshe rabs stong nas gnas pa'i sdig pa kun/ /bzlas brjod mar mes
<p>108b.7</p>myur du sel bar byed/ /tshe rabs gzhan du gang dag byas pa yi/ /sdig pa ma lus bzlas brjod byas pas 'byung / /bzlas pas sdig pa ma lus byung bar 'gyur/ /las kyi dbang gyur bdag po med pa dang / /mgon med rten med tshe rabs gcig nas gcig /
<p>109a</p>
<p>109a.1</p>lus kyi kha bsgyur rjes su gang 'gro ba/ /de yi rjes su dge dang mi dge 'brang / /sngags kyi rtsa ba dang po tshul khrims te/ /de nas brtson 'grus dang ni bzod pa dang / /rgyal ba la ni dad dang byang chub sems/ /gsang sngags dang ni le lo med
<p>109a.2</p>pa'o/ /chags dang rnam bral dge pa dang / /rtag tu dkon mchog gsum la sems gzhol zhing / /sdig pa spangs shing bzlas brjod ldan pa yi/ /mi la lha rdzas dngos grub ring ba med/ /khyod kyis ji ltar gsungs pa de bzhin du/ /mi yis legs par sbyangs
<p>109a.3</p>pa bgyis na ni/ /de dag myur bar dbul ba'i mun bsal nas/ /nyi ma bzhin du shin tu 'bar bar 'gyur/ /yan lag mi nyams sems kyang mi nyams shing / /nad dang sdug bsngal lus nyams mi 'gyur ba/ /khyod la dad pa'i mis ni thob par 'gyur/ /lus dang
<p>109a.4</p>ngag yid lag pa mig dang ni/ /smin mtshams yan lag rnam par g.yo ba dang / /rab tu bsdams nas de la yid gzhol zhing / /byams la gnas shing ku sha'i khri la 'dug /ji srid du ni rtse gcig gnas gyur pa/ /de srid du ni 'bum mam nyi shu bzlas/ /ji ltar ri
<p>109a.5</p>dwags dbang po khros pa dag /mthu stobs chen po glang chen gsod pa dang / /de bzhin spyang ki phag dang ri dwags dang / /wa rnams kyang ni myur du gsod pa ltar/ /de bzhin sngags pas seng ge'i tshul gyis su/ /rab dang 'bring dang tha mal las rnams la/ /brtson 'grus
<p>109a.6</p>chen po dag dang ldan pa dang / /'bad pa mchog rnams kyis kyang bsten bar bya/ /rtse gcig sems dang ldan pa'i rmi lam ni/ /yid las byung ba'i dga' ba rab tu skyes/ /dga' bas lus ni shin tu sbyangs pa thob/ /lus sbyangs pas ni bde ba'i skal ldan 'gyur/ 
<p>109a.7</p>lus bde rtse gcig sems dang ting 'dzin gyis/ /de tshe bzlas brjod dogs pa med par 'gyur/ /dngos grub nye dang bzlog pa la dga' dang / /sems ni nam yang sdig la dga' mi 'gyur/ /bkres skom tsha rlung grang dang dal ba yi/ /sdug bsngal drag pos nyen
<p>109b</p>
<p>109b.1</p>kyang g.yo mi 'gyur/ /sbrang bu sha sbrang srin bu grog sbur dang / /sdig sbrul rkang pa brgyad dang sbrul dang 'dre/ /sha za srul po rnams kyang de yi ni/ /lus dang grib ma la yang mi 'gom mo/ /tshig ni gzung bar 'os shing yid gzhungs la/ /snyan dngags dang ni 'dri ba rnams
<p>109b.2</p>la mkhas/ /chos la mngon dga' gter rnams mthong ba dang / /lus kyi nad dang dri ma med par 'gyur/ /skye bos mthong ngam thos par gyur kyang rung / /myur du mngon dga' yid du 'ong bar 'gyur/ /bud med 'dod lha'i mda' yis phog pa rnams/ /'dod
<p>109b.3</p>lha'i longs spyod phyir ni 'dod par 'gyur/ /gang tshe mkhas pas lha dang gnod sbyin dang / /dri za lha yi bu mo'i lus dang sgra/ /mis ni dga' ba'i yid kyis mthong thos dang / /de tshe shin tu nye bar gyur pa yin/ /dper na rlung med khang pa'i nang du ni/ /mar me
<p>109b.4</p>btsugs pa mi g.yo 'bar ba ltar/ /rtse gcig sems kyis bzlas la mngon dga' ba'i/ /lus la chos kyang de bzhin 'bar bar 'gyur/ /sna rtser blta zhing rnam par rtog pa spong / /nam zhig bskyed kyang rnam par mi g.yo ba/ /de tshe dmigs la gnas pa
<p>109b.5</p>thob pa ste/ /sems ni las su rung bar 'gyur bar des/ /sangs rgyas kyis gsungs yan lag brgyad pa 'di/ /yang dag 'tsho dang las mtha' ting 'dzin gang / /rtsol dang rtog dang dran dang lta ba rnams/ /so so so sor yan lag bsten par bya/ /'jigs
<p>109b.6</p>kyang tshangs pa brgya byin khyab 'jug dang / /drag po rlung sogs rnams la phyag mi bya/ /de yi chos 'chad pa la mi brten cing / /de dag dka' thub mi bya brtag mi bya/ /de rnams chos la ngan sems mi bya zhing / /de yi spyod la nam yang dga' mi bya/ /de dag bskyod
<p>109b.7</p>pa mi gdon sngags mi bzlas/ /sbyin pa sbyin chen snying rje bskyed nas kyang / /bde bar gshegs pa kun gyis bsten pa yin/ /gnas dang rgyal sras rnams la phyag bya'o/ /rang sangs rgyas dang rgyal ba'i nyan thos dang / /de dag rtag tu phyag bya'i gnas yin no/ /ji
<p>110a</p>
<p>110a.1</p>ltar zla ba tshes la mi rnams kyis/ /phyag 'tshal nya ba lus can phyag mi 'tshal/ /de bzhin dad pas rgyal ba'i thugs sras la/ /phyag bya'i de ltar bde bar gshegs la min/ /'jig rten kun gyi mngon mtho bslab pa can/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i
<p>110a.2</p>don du ni/ /skye ba len pa 'di la ci yi phyir/ /bu gcig bdag nyid kun gyis phyag mi bya/ /skyes bu bsam yas rmad byung rdzu 'phrul can/ /de la mi ngan gang zhig mi 'dud pa/ /de la rgyal ba thams cad thugs byung nas/ /de yi gsang sngags dngos grub mi stsol to/ /dper na shing
<p>110a.3</p>gi me tog dang por ni/ /yid 'ong phyi nas 'bras bur gyur pa ltar/ /sems can mchog rnams me tog 'dra bar ltos/ /'bras bu bzhin du rgyal ba rig par gyis/ /gang gi rang bzhin chags sdang rnam bral yang / /gdul bya'i don phyir khro la khro ba dang / /'dod
<p>110a.4</p>chags can la chags chen ltar ston dang / /byang chub mchog gnas de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig las dang rnam smin mkhyen pa yi/ /'gro ba kun dang ji ltar mthun pa yi/ /gsang sngags gzugs kyi rjes su chags mdzad pa/ /sngags kyi rnams 'dren de la phyag
<p>110a.5</p>'tshal lo/ /de phyir log par lta ba rnam spangs la/ /yang dag lta ba la ni brten par gyis/ /bud med mtshan nyid skyes pa'i mtshan nyid dang / /sman dang glang chen brtag pa'am skar ma'i dpyad/ /mtshon cha brtag pa'am rta dpyad rang bzo'am/ bstan bcos
<p>110a.6</p>ngan pa slob cing klog pa spang / /yul pa'i gtam dang mi dbang bsten pa dang / /dmag dang gyad dang na chung gtam dag dang / /sgrung ldebs dang ni sngon gyi lo rgyus gtam/ /'dod chags dang ni smad 'tshong gtam mi bya/ /bdag la bstod par nam yang mi bya zhing / /
<p>110a.7</p>sems can gzhan la smad par mi bya'o/ /stag dang sbrul dang me 'drar 'jig rten dag /bsams nas spangs te dben la dga' bar bya/ /sngags la gsang sngags bzlas pa mnos nas ni/ /grong dang grong khyer khyim dang gtsug lag khang / /mchod rten bsti gnas ri dang
<p>110b</p>
<p>110b.1</p>dka' thub gnas/ /kun dga' lu ma'am rdzing bur 'gro mi bya/ /sngar bshad pa yi gnas rnams ma rnyed na/ /lha khang stong pa nyams dga'i shing drung ngam/ /ri dang chu klung chu bo 'bab chu dang / /nags tshal stong pa dag dang yul stong dang / /gnas gang rung bar
<p>110b.2</p>sngags pas gnas shing bzlas/ /yang na gnas ni nges par ma byas na/ /zla ba brgyad po 'di yi dus dag tu/ /gnas 'di gang yang rung ba gcig tu bsten/ /mtsho dang shing dang ri bo'am dgon pa'i gnas/ /mtshe'u dang khang pa nags dang chu ngogs su/ /dgun
<p>110b.3</p>dpyid zla ba rnams su gnas byas la/ /sngags pas dbyar ni gcig pur gnas bya ste/ /ji ltar rgyal bas dge slong dbyar zla gsum/ /tshul zhugs gzhan du mi 'gro gsungs pa bzhin/ /de bzhin bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags pa la/ /zla ba gsum du gcig pur
<p>110b.4</p>gnas par gsungs/ /sngags pas dbyar ni bsgrub la mi 'jug par/ /bzlas brjod kyis ni dus kyang 'da' bar bya/ /dbyar zla nas ni sngags pas gzi bskyed nas/ /bdag nyid bsrung byas sgrub la 'jug par bya/ /yongs su 'dzin pa rnam par spangs nas su/ /
<p>110b.5</p>chos gos dang ni bsod snyoms ngan ngon dang / /stan dang mal stan ngan ngon tsam gyis kyang / /chog pa'i sems dang ldan pas bsod nams thob/ /gtsug phud bzhag nas sgra ni bregs nas su/ /'byung khungs tshon gyis gos kyi kha dog bsgyur/ /gos dkar dag
<p>110b.6</p>gam shing lo 'am gso ma 'am/ /zar ma shing shun rnams kyi gos bgo'o/ /ku 'am lcags sam 'jim pa las byas pa/ /dbyibs ni legs shing mi rtsub 'jam pa dang / /ma chag zlum zhing ma nyams rma med pa/ /yid du 'ong ba'i lhung bzed bcad bar bya/ /
<p>110b.7</p>bza' btung mod cing dmangs rigs mang ba dang / /mgron la mchod byed legs par gnas pa'i grong / /ha cang mi nye ha cang mi ring ba/ /bram ze'i phyi rol skye bo med pa bsten/ /nga rgyal gyis ni non pa'i bram ze rnams/ /rigs kyis rlom zhing snying rje mi ldan
<p>111a</p>
<p>111a.1</p>pa/ /de dag bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten la/ /mchod pa mthong na gegs kyang byed par 'gyur/ /bram ze sangs rgyas pa las ji ltar dman/ /dmangs las bram ze dag la dmangs rigs rnams/ /bsnyen bskur dang ni mchod par
<p>111a.2</p>'gyur bas na/ /dmangs rigs kyis kyang gsang sngags ji ltar bzlas/ /lha dang mgron mchod pa dang las drug dang / /rgyal po dang ni me la brten pa dang / /bu yi don du 'gro bar bya ba dag /bram ze rnams kyis nges par 'grub pa yin/ /rgyal rigs rje'u
<p>111a.3</p>rigs dag kyang rang gi las/ /'grub pa 'di la the tshom ma byed ces/ /brdzun du smra ba sna tshogs skyon dag gis/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi sems ni sreg par byed/ /yan lag brgyad la gnas par rtag tu ni/ /nyi ma phyed mtshams tshun chad blang bar bya/ /bram
<p>111a.4</p>ze'i dus ni phyi dro yin pas na/ /de phyir bram ze'i khyim du 'gro mi bya/ /dper na rma ni gso dang bsal ba'i phyir/ /nad pa dag la sman pas sbyin pa ltar/ /de bzhin 'dir yang bkres pa'i sdug bsngal dag /bsal phyir rgyal bas kha zas bza' bar gsungs/ 
<p>111a.5</p>la la lam gyis dub cing 'gro ba'i tshe/ /bkres skom gdungs pas rang gi bu yi sha/ /za ba bzhin du rnal 'byor sems dman zhing / /khe dang rgyags phyir bza' bar mi bya'o/ /mang du blugs na rtsol med mtho ba dang / /de bzhin nyung ngu yang ni dmas 'gyur
<p>111a.6</p>la/ /ran par skad cig mnyam par 'gro ba ltar/ /lus can kha zas de ltar bza' bar bya/ /dper na khang rnying mi shigs bya ba'i phyir/ /mi yis ka ba brtan po btsugs pa ltar/ /de bzhin lus kyis 'khrul 'khor gnas pa dang / /rta yi mig dku bzhin
<p>111a.7</p>du kha zas bza'/ /'dod pa'i khams ni zas kyis gnas pa shes/ /rgyal bas chos gcig tu ni bka' stsal pa/ /lus ni chu shing bzhin du rig bya ste/ /sems ni bza' btung sogs la chags mi bya/ /dbang po drug po yul la 'phyo ba na/ /bde gshegs
<p>111b</p>
<p>111b.1</p>gsungs pa'i shes pas bsrung bar bya/ /lhung bzed de dag las ni gcig thogs nas/ /gnya' shing gang du blta zhing bsod snyoms spyad/ /'dzum zhing 'gro la smra zhing mig zur can/ /yan lag thams cad yid 'phrog byed pa'i gzugs/ /bud med gzugs ni
<p>111b.2</p>mtshon cha 'obs 'dra bas/ /skyes pa'i sems ni mngon du 'phrog par byed/ /lcags kyi thong lcags rab tu 'bar ba yis/ /mig ni rnam par bkag pa ches sla'o/ /nyis na dran pa nyams byed bud med kyi/ /dkyus ring mig can bzhin ni ma mthong sla/ /gang du dga'
<p>111b.3</p>bar 'dzin cing mthong byed la/ /sems kyis sems ni rnam par 'dul bzhin du/ /rab dang 'bring la sogs pa spangs nas su/ /mi smra ba ni gzhan gyi khyim du 'gro/ /gang na bzhon be'u phru gu chung ba dang / /gang na bu mo gzhon bsten rtse ba dang / /de bzhin gang na
<p>111b.4</p>gzhon nu rtse ba dang / /gang na khye'u za dga' ston byed pa dang / /gang na skye bo mang po 'dus pa dang / /de bzhin gang na rol mo byed pa rnams/ /der ni skyes bu nam yang 'gro mi bya/ /bsod snyoms ci rnyed khyer te 'ongs nas kyang / /dang po ji ltar bde bar bgo bar
<p>111b.5</p>bya/ /rkang bkrus glo bur ba la byin nas su/ /lus bsrung phyir ni kha zas bza' bar bya/ /dus su zos nas dus su khrus byas te/ /gang tshe zlos dga'i sems ni zhi ba la/ /brten pa nyid kyis dran pa rmongs gyur na/ /langs nas 'chag cing phyogs su blta ba
<p>111b.6</p>dang / /chu yis gdong yang yongs su bkru bar bya/ /gling bu'i sgra dang rnga yi sgra rnams dang / /shin tu 'jigs byed skye bo'i sgra dag dang / /gad rgyangs ku co dag dang glu sgra dang / /bing dang pi wang dag dang rdza rnga'i sgra/ /bya bran sna tshogs sgra dang chu sgra dang / /bud
<p>111b.7</p>med rgyan gyi sil khrol sgra rnams dang / /sha sbrang tsha grang rlung gi gnod pa yis/ /mi yi sems ni g.yeng zhing g.yo bar byed/ /stangs dang mchongs pa dang ni gar byed dang / /glu len rnga brdung skye pos dbyas 'gyur dang / /lhag pa'i nga rgyal sred dang 'dod chen dang / /
<p>112a</p>
<p>112a.1</p>rgyal po dang ni 'dus pa blta 'dod dang / /dus min gnyid dang mi 'grub smra ba dang / /bstan bcos nyan dang snyan dngags glog 'don dang / /'dod chags 'jigs dang dregs dang rgyags pa dang / /zhe la 'dzin dang le lo g.yo sgyu spang / /glang chen rta dang ba
<p>112a.2</p>lang bya gag khyi/ /gong mo sreg pa 'ug pa skyes pa dang / /bud med bu mo de bzhin ra lug sogs/ /'thab mo 'gyed pa mi lta mi bya'o/ /'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs tshogs ldan pa'i/ /sems ni 'khor ba yin par kun du brjod/ /nyon mongs rnam grol shel dang zla 'dra
<p>112a.3</p>la/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i mthar ni rab tu bsgrags/ /dper na dri med chu ni rdul sogs kyis/ /skad cig tu yang rnyog par byed pa ltar/ /de bzhin rnam dag dri ma med pa'i sems/ /'dod chags la sogs skyon gyis rnyog par 'gyur/ /lam 'di rnams kyis gsang
<p>112a.4</p>sngags dngos grub cing / /de bzhin 'dir ni mtho ris thar pa 'thob/ /rgyal sras sngon gyi rgyal ba 'das pa dang / /'di nas gshegs shing de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur/ /grogs med sems kyis lus dang ngag yid kyi/ /gus pas bsod nams gang dag bsags pa
<p>112a.5</p>yang / /bde gshegs gsungs pa'i bden pa'i lam dmigs na/ /dge ba'i las de yang dag bskyed pa yin/ /slob dpon man ngag gces par bsten pa yi/ /don sbas pa dang las kyi skabs rnams kyi/ /so so'i ting 'dzin sgo sogs tha dad pas/ /dpung bzangs
<p>112a.6</p>zhus las gnas pa rim bzhin min/ /gnas pa'i le'u las gnas pa dang po'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //rnal 'byor sgrub pos 'khor ba yid dbyung zhing / /mya ngan 'das la mchog tu gzhol ba des/ /snyoms 'jug sgrib pa dang ni bral don du/ /ting 'dzin
<p>112a.7</p>sbyor phyir lha yi gnas pa bsgom/ /rtog dang dpyod dang dga' dang bde ba ni/ /sems rtse gcig pa'i dang po yan lag lnga/ /'das pa'i tshig gis ma 'ongs gnas pa rnams/ /gsang sngags mdo sde'i tshul las bshad pa yin/ /gling bu'i sgra dang rnga yi sgra rnams dang / /shin tu
<p>112b</p>
<p>112b.1</p>'jigs byed skye ba'i dgra rnams dang / /sha sbrang tsha grang rlung gi gnod pa yis/ /mi yi sems de g.yeng zhing g.yo bar byed/ /'dzum zhing 'gro la smra zhing mig zur can/ /yan lag thams cad yid 'phrog byed pa'i gzugs/ /bud med gzugs ni mtshon cha 'jebs
<p>112b.2</p>pa 'dra/ /skyes pa'i sems ni mngon du 'phrog par byed/ /lcags kyi thong sregs rab tu 'bar ba yis/ /mig ni rnam par bkag pa ches bla yi/ /nyis na dran pa nyams byed bud med kyi/ /dkyus rings mig can bzhin ni ma mthong sla/ /stag dang sbrul dang me 'drar
<p>112b.3</p>'jig rten na/ /bsams nas spangs te dben la dga' bar bya/ /dga' ba lus ni shin tu sbyangs par mthong / /lus sbyangs pas ni bde ba'i skal ldan 'gyur/ /rtse gcig sems dang ldan pa'i mi la ni/ /yid las byung ba'i dga' ba rab tu skye/ /rtog dpyod med pas
<p>112b.4</p>nad ni rab tu skye/ /dga' sogs gnyis pa'i yan lag rnam bzhir bstan/ /sems ni dang bas lha yi bde ba dang / /mtho ris dang ni byang grol thob par 'gyur/ /btang snyoms dang ni dran dang shes bzhin dang / /bde dang rtse gcig pa yi yan lag lnga/ /
<p>112b.5</p>btang snyoms ldan zhes tshangs pa'i tshe gcig dang / /dper na rlung med khang pa'i nang du ni/ /mar me btsugs pa mi g.yo 'bar ba ltar/ /rtse gcig sems kyis zlos la mngon dga' ba'i/ /lus la chos kyang de bzhin 'bar bar 'gyur/ /btang snyoms yongs
<p>112b.6</p>dag dran pa yongs su dag /sdug bsngal ma yin bde min sems rtse gcig /grags dang ma grags rnyed dang mi rnyed dang / /bde dang sdug bsngal de bzhin bstod smad dag /sems kyis 'jig rten chos brgyad rab bcom ste/ /sdig pa'i gnas su gyur pa spang bar
<p>112b.7</p>bya/ /bsam gtan gyi lha'i gnas pa ste le'u lnga pa'o// //rgyal sras rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa ni/ /gnas skabs kun du gzhan don lhur len pas/ /gnas pa tshangs pa'i rgyu ni bshad bya ste/ /byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms ldan/ /
<p>113a</p>
<p>113a.1</p>tshad med pa'i gnas pa ste le'u drug pa'o// //chos dbyings rtogs pa la 'jug gzhol ba'i yul/ /rnam thar sgo gsum bsgom par bya ba'i phyir/ /gnas pa gsum pa bdag gis khyod la bshad/ /thub pa'i lung bzhin gus pa'i sems kyis nyon/ 
<p>113a.2</p>gzugs ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ldan/ /de ni bdag min bdag kyang gzugs ma yin/ /bud med mtshan nyid skyes pa'i mtshan nyid dang / /sman dang glang chen brtag pa'am skar ma'i dpyad/ /mtshon tshe brtag pa'am rta dpyad rang bzo'am/ /bstan bcos ngan pa
<p>113a.3</p>spang zhing klog pa spang / /yul pa'i gtam dang mi dbang bsten pa dang / /dmag dang gyad dang na chung bsten pa dang / /sgrung ldebs dang ni sngon gyi lo rgyus gtam/ /'dod pa'i gtam dang smad 'tshong gtam mi bya/ /rnam par thar pa bstan pa ste le'u bdun pa'o// //
<p>113a.4</p>ji ltar rtsa ba ma bcad shing / /yal ga de las skye 'gyur ltar/ /nyon mongs rtsa ba ma bcad la/ /dngos por lta ba nyon mongs 'byung / /de phyir nyon mongs bdud gzhom phyir/ /chos rnams stod pa nyid bsgom pa/ /bdag gis rgyud las gsungs bzhin du/ /bshad
<p>113a.5</p>kyis dga' ba'i yid kyis nyon/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gsungs pa/ /stong nyid dbye ba bsdus pa ni/ /rnal 'byor pa ni gang gis shes/ /stong nyid de ni shes par 'gyur/ /mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i phyir/ /stong nyid bsgom par yongs su gsungs/ /nang gi bdag
<p>113a.6</p>nyid chos rnams ni/ /kun du rtog pa'i gnyen po dang / /phyin ci log gi rnam pa dag /phyi nang stong pa nyid du bshad/ /phyi rol dmigs pa dang bral ba/ /phyi rol stong pa nyid du bshad/ /nang gi cho ga chos rnams dang / /phyi rol du yang mi rtog pa/ /'dir ni phyi dang nang
<p>113a.7</p>gi ni/ /stong pa nyid du yang dag bshad/ /snod kyi 'jig rten rten bral ba/ /chen po stong pa nyid du brjod/ /le lo ye shes rdzogs pa la/ /rjes su dmigs pa byed phyir ro/ /de yi mi mthun phyogs stong pa/ /dngos med stong pa nyid stong nyid/ /don dam par ni
<p>113b</p>
<p>113b.1</p>brdzun pa'i dngos/ /shes pa don dam stong pa nyid/ /'dus byas sbyin pa la sogs kyis/ /dge ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ /rang gi rnam rtog mtshan nyid spyod/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid du bshad/ /yang dag byang chub 'dus ma byas/ /rgyu mtshan yang ni dmigs su med/ /
<p>113b.2</p>dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs/ /'dus ma byas pa stong nyid gsungs/ /sems can don du smon lam sogs/ /rab dga' la sogs dmigs su med/ /kun rtog thams cad rnam spangs pa/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong nyid gsungs/ /thog mtha' med
<p>113b.3</p>pa'i 'jig rten gyis/ /'gro ba'i phyir ni smon lam nyid/ /rlom sems med pa de brjod do/ /thog mtha' med pa'i stong pa nyid/ /mya ngan 'das par dmigs pa med/ /dge ba'i bdag nyid mi gtong ba/ /rlom sems med pa zhes bshad de/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid/ /
<p>113b.4</p>'dod chags la sogs dri ma ni/ /bdag gi rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o/ /de ltar rlom sems med ces gsungs/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid du gsal/ /mtshan dang dpe byad la sogs pa'i/ /gzugs sku de ni yon tan no/ /gzhan rnams la yang mi dmigs pa/ /rang gi
<p>113b.5</p>mtshan nyid stong pa nyid/ /byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams ni/ /spyod pa la yang rlom sems med/ /chos rnams thams cad stong nyid bshad/ /bdag dang skyes bu'i chos rnams ni/ /sgro btags dngos po med pa'i mchog /'ching ba thams cad rnam par bcad/ /dngos
<p>113b.6</p>po stong pa nyid du gsungs/ /ji ltar mngon sum stong pa nyid/ /de ltar dngos po med shes pa/ /slar yang mi dmigs pa nyid ni/ /dngos po med pa'i stong nyid 'dod/ /de ltar stong nyid phye ba yang / /bag chags rnams kyi gnyen po'i phyir/ /smra ba mchog gis gsungs
<p>113b.7</p>pa de/ /nyon mongs bdud ni gzhom pa'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams rtag tu bsgom/ /stong pa nyid kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //da ni stong pa nyid kyi tshul ji ltar gsungs pa bshad du gsol/ /rdo rje slob dpon ston pas yang gsungs pa/ da ni chos kun yang dag
<p>114a</p>
<p>114a.1</p>par/ /dngos po'i tshul gyis mi len te/ /sgyu ma rmi lam smig rgyu ltar/ /rkyen gyi dbang gis 'jug phyir ro/ /dgag par bya ba med pas na/ /yang dag bgag pa med par mngon/ /de ltar de nyid rtogs pa de/ /thams cad dngos por len mi
<p>114a.2</p>byed/ /de yis de ni rtogs pa ste/ /mi stong ma yin yod med min/ /mi skye ma yin skye min zhes/ /bya ba la sogs bcom ldan gsungs/ /bsam gtan gyi ni las 'di yin/ /gsang ba'i tshig rnams bsams na ni/ /'bras bu rdzogs par thob 'gyur gyi/ /'dod
<p>114a.3</p>pa tsam gyis de ltar min/ /tshig rnams re re'i rnal 'byor la/ /mngon du phyogs par byed bzhin du/ /gsang sngags ngan pa brjod pa 'di/ /tshig gi sgras ni tshig re la/ /mi byar mi rung bstan pa yin/ /rnal 'byor med pa'i gsang sngags 'di/ /de ltar 'bras bu
<p>114a.4</p>ster mi 'gyur/ /gsang sngags tshig 'di gsang sngags te/ /de phyir rnal 'byor med mi bya/ /mdo'i don 'dis 'od gsal ba la 'jug par byas te/ oM shU n+ya tA zhes bya ba'o/ /'od gsal ba yi ngo bo las/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas snyoms zhugs nas/ /zung du 'jug
<p>114a.5</p>pa'i rnal 'byor la/ /thabs dang ldan pas ldan par bya/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba dang / /de bzhin rdzogs pa'i rim pa yang / /gang la de gnyis gcig gyur pa/ /de ni zung du 'jug par bshad/ /'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ /rtog pa gnyis po spangs
<p>114a.6</p>pa ni/ /gang zhig dngos po gcig 'gyur pa/ /zung du 'jug ces de la bshad/ /kun rdzob dang ni don dam dag /rtog pa gnyis dang yang dag bral/ /gang du yang dag 'dres gyur pa/ /de ni zung du 'jug par bshad/ /rdo rje bzlas par rab sbyor bas/ /rlung gi
<p>114a.7</p>mtshan nyid shes nas ni/ /rnam rtog rlung rnams yang dag gcod/ /sems la dmigs pa thob par 'gyur/ /bdag byin brlab pa'i rim pas kyang / /dngos grub chen po brgyad thob 'gyur/ /sra ba la sogs rim pas shes/ /mngon par byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /
<p>114b</p>
<p>114b.1</p>zung 'jug rim pa la gnas pas/ /dngos grub thams cad sdud pa ni/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor pa yis the tshom med/ /phyag rgya chen po dngos grub che/ /zung du 'jug pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /rnam rtog med par zhugs pas ni/ /thob par
<p>114b.2</p>'di la the tshom med/ /'od gsal ba dang zung du 'jug pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pas nyon mongs pa'i bdud bcom nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen pos phung po'i bdud bcom te/ /rnam par rtog
<p>114b.3</p>pa'i rab rib bsal nas ni/ /mi rtog ye shes zla ba ji bzhin du/ /shar ba'i dri med phung po rab spangs nas/ /mya ngan 'das pa chen po zhes bshad do/ /mi rtog chos kun nam mkha'i dkyil nas ni/ /gzugs sku dri med nyi ma zla ba shar/ /gdul bya gnyis kyi
<p>114b.4</p>ma rig mun sel ba/ /thub pa chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thub pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thub pa sprul pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thub pa dpag med 'phro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thub pa 'od kyis mun pa sel la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
<p>114b.5</p>e ma 'gro kun 'gro dbang phyug /nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa rnyed/ /e ma dam tshig de nyid gsum/ /mchog tu rmad byung ston par mdzad/ /khams gsum las ni rnam par grol/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid/ /'dod pa rnams kyis ma gos pa/ /dmigs
<p>114b.6</p>med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phung po rnams dang khams rnams dang / /skye mched rnams la mi brten cing / /srid dang mya ngan 'das las grol/ /ji ltar nam mkha' gnas med cing / /spros pa med cing gos pa med/ /mkha' dang mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba/ /
<p>114b.7</p>dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig dge ba mi spyoms shing / /nyes pa rnams ni 'chab par byed/ /gzhan la gcig tu phan mdzad pa/ /bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mig gis mig ni bsrung ba ltar/ /gang la brten de bdag bsrung zhing / /
<p>115a</p>
<p>115a.1</p>spyod pa thun mong lta gnas pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun phyag 'tshal/ /gang zhig la brten thub pa rnams/ /mngon par rdzogs par byang chub mdzad/ /gdul bya rnams phyir sna tshogs gzugs/ /sems can rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang la
<p>115a.2</p>rmongs na 'khor 'gyur zhing / /gang shes thar pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /rtag bzhugs lha yi 'khor lo mchog /bdag nyid la ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdud phyir bzlog pa'i rim pa sgrub pa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa la bstod pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //sgrub pa'i spyod pa
<p>115a.3</p>la 'jug pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po dpal dz+nyA na badzra zhes bya ba/ gsang ba 'dus pa'i rim pa gsum gyi man ngag dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i zhabs kyi ze'u 'bru spyi bos len pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dge bsnyen
<p>115a.4</p>chen po btsun pa ku mA ra dang bod kyi lo tsA ba lha btsun pas bsgyur cing zhus pa dge'o/[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI gu h+ya sa mA dza de wa maN+Dal kA ya sto tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i sku la bstod pa zhes
<p>115a.5</p>bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig khams gsum las grol dngos nyid sku/ /dag cing rab zhi rnal 'byor yul gyur pa/ /mnyam med bde bas brgyan pa 'gro ba'i mgon/ /'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor lha tshogs bstod par bgyi/ /zhal
<p>115a.6</p>gsum phyag drug bai DUr+ya ltar dngas/ /dkar dmar g.yas pa rdo rje 'khor lo dang / /pad+ma dril bu rin chen ral gri 'dzin/ /mi bskyod rdo rje gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rab dkar g.yas ni mthing ga g.yon dmar zhal/ /phyag g.yas 'khor lo rdo rje pad+ma 'dzin/ /g.yon pas dril bu
<p>115a.7</p>rin chen ral gri bsnams/ /rdo rje rnam snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mthing dang dkar ba'i zhal dbus gser gyi mdog /nor bu rdo rje 'khor lo g.yas na 'dzin/ /dril bu pad+ma ral gris phyag g.yon brgyan/ /rdo rje rin chen tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rab chags drag po zhi
<p>115b</p>
<p>115b.1</p>ba'i zhal mnga' ba/ /pad+ma kha 'byed rdo rje 'khor lo dang / /g.yon pa dril bu pad sdod rin chen gri/ /mtha' yas rdo rje de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbus ljang g.yas mthing g.yon pa dkar ba'i zhal/ /ral gri sna tshogs rdo rje 'khor lo dang / /dril bu pad ljang nor
<p>115b.2</p>bu phyag na bsnams/ /don grub rdo rje de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbus zhi g.yas drag g.yon pa dbang gi zhal/ /'khor lo rdo rje ut+pal g.yas na 'dzin/ /g.yon pa'i phyag na dril bu rin chen gri/ /nad zhi lha mo spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /char sprin lta bu'i
<p>115b.3</p>g.yas g.yon dkar dmar zhal/ /rdo rje 'khor lo de bzhin ut+pal g.yas/ /dril bu rin chen ral gri g.yon na 'dzin/ /bgegs 'joms mA ma kI la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dmar mthing dkar ba'i zhal gsum go rims bzhin/ /pad sdong dril bu rin chen ral gri g.yon/ /
<p>115b.4</p>g.yas pas kha 'byed rdo rje 'khor lo 'chang / /gdon 'joms gos dkar can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ljang mthing dkar ba'i dbus dang g.yas g.yon zhal/ /sna tshogs rdo rje 'khor lo ut+pal dang / /dril bu rin chen ral gri rtag tu 'dzin/ /'gro kun dbang
<p>115b.5</p>mdzad sgrol mar phyag 'tshal lo/ /spyan dang sku mdog phyag mtshan mtshungs pa la/ /khyad par gzugs phung gsal ba'i me long 'dzin/ /mchog gzugs mchod pas mgon kun mnyes mdzad ma/ /rdo rje gzugs med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis rgyud
<p>115b.6</p>mangs sgra sgrogs shing / /sku dang phyag rgya gzhan ni bdag ma mtshungs/ /mtshungs med sgra yis skyob rnams rab mchod ma/ /rdo rje sgra ma de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gos dkar lha mo ji bzhin gsal ba la/ /mchog tu rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis dung chos 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas
<p>115b.7</p>rnams ni dri yis tshim mdzad ma/ /rdo rje dri ma de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhal gsum phyag drug sgrol ma lta bu la/ /mtshungs med ro mchog dag pa'i snod 'chad zhing / /mkha' khyab rgyal ba ro yis mnyes mdzad ma/ /rdo rje ro ma de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngo skya dkar dang
<p>116a</p>
<p>116a.1</p>dmar ba'i zhal gsum mnga'/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po ji bzhin phyag rgya gsal/ /bde chen reg mchog rnams kyis mgon mchod mdzad/ /rdo rje reg ma de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba'i zhal dang sku mdog phyag mtshan rnams/ /gti mug rnam par
<p>116a.2</p>spyod dang mtshungs pa la/ /phyag g.yas klu shing me tog mdzes pa 'dzin/ /rdo rje byams pa mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzugs phung rnam dag me long ye shes can/ /de dang sku mdog phyag mtshan khyad med cing / /mig dbang thogs med rdo rje stsol mdzad pa/ /rdo rje sa snying po la
<p>116a.3</p>phyag 'tshal lo/ /nga rgyal sbyong mdzad mgon po lta bu'i sku/ /zhal gsum phyag drug phyag rgya drug dang ldan/ /sgra gsum thogs med mi phyed rang bzhin nyid/ /phyag na rdo rje de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshor bdag mnyam nyid ye shes mnga' brnyes pa'i/ /rgyal ba ji bzhin sku
<p>116a.4</p>yi phyag rgya 'chang / /sna dbang rang zhi mi phyed rang bzhin sku/ /rdo rje mkha' snying de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhal mdog phyag dang de bzhin mtshan ma rnams/ /'dod chags sbyong bar mdzad pa'i mgon po bzhin/ /mi thogs mi phyed lce dbang rab stsol ba/ /rdo rje 'jig rten dbang la
<p>116a.5</p>phyag 'tshal lo/ /'du shes rnam dag kun rtog ye shes la/ /mnga' brnyes skyob pa lta bu'i cha lugs can/ /chags thogs mi mnga' mi phyed shes rab nyid/ /rdo rje 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /log pa'i dad can sbyong mdzad bcom ldan 'das/ /ji bzhin
<p>116a.6</p>sku yi rnam par 'phrul bkod nas/ /mi phyed rdo rje'i sku mchog rang bzhin can/ /rdo rje sgrib kun sel la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig sku ni 'du byed rnam dag nas/ /bya grub ye shes mnga' brnyes dang mtshungs te/ /shes dang shes bya rab zhi 'od gsal dag /rdo rje
<p>116a.7</p>kun du bzang por phyag 'tshal lo/ /'bar ba'i dbus bzhugs gnag dkar dmar zhal khro/ /dbyug pa 'khor lo rdo rje g.yas na 'dzin/ /sdigs mdzub zhags pa dril bu dgra sta g.yon/ /rdo rje gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mdog dkar gnag
<p>116b</p>
<p>116b.1</p>dang dmar po g.yas g.yon zhal/ /phyag drug rdo rje dbyug pa sdigs mdzub zhags/ /dril bu dgra sta 'dzin mdzad khro chen sku/ /rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub phyag 'tshal lo/ /khro rgyal gang zhig dmar gnag dkar ba'i zhal/ /pad+ma ral gri gtun shing g.yas pas
<p>116b.2</p>'dzin/ /g.yon pa bsnyems bcas dril bu dgra sta zhags/ /rdo rje rta mgrin de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbus gnag g.yas dkar g.yon pa dmar ba'i zhal/ /sna tshogs rdo rje 'khor lo gtun shing dang / /sdigs mdzub dril bu dgra sta 'chang byed khro/ /rdo rje
<p>116b.3</p>bdud rtsi 'khyil la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnag dmar dkar zhal rab tu bzhad mdzad cing / /ral gri rdo rje 'khor lo g.yas na 'dzin/ /sdigs mdzub dgra sta zhags pa g.yon na bsnams/ /rdo rje mi g.yo mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khro chen mthing gnag dkar
<p>116b.4</p>dang dmar ba'i zhal/ /rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis hUM mdzad phyag rgya mdzad/ /rdo rje ral gri zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin/ /rdo rje 'dod pa'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngo dmar dkar ba'i zhal mnga' khro rgyal ni/ /dbyug pa ral gri 'khor lo g.yas na 'dzin/ /sdigs
<p>116b.5</p>mdzub ral gri dgra sta g.yon na mda'/ /rdo rje dbyug sngon can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gtum chen gnag dmar dkar ba'i zhal gsum mnga'/ /dbyug pa ral gri 'khor lo phyag g.yas 'dzin/ /sdigs mdzub ral gri dgra sta g.yon na bsnams/ /rdo rje stobs po
<p>116b.6</p>che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sdo dmar dkar ba'i zhal mnga' khro bo'i gtso/ /rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis spyi bor gtsug tor 'dzin/ /gzhan rnams rdo rje pad+ma sdigs mdzub gri/ /rdo rje gtsug tor rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnag dmar dkar ba'i zhal ldan khro rgyal ni/ /
<p>116b.7</p>rdo rje 'khor lo nor bu phyag g.yas 'chang / /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa pad+ma gri/ /rdo rje gnod mdzes rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkyil 'khor mtshor gnas lha sku'i me tog sum cu rtsa gnyis la/ /rab dang bung bas bstod pa'i lces blangs dge chen sbrang rtsi
<p>117a</p>
<p>117a.1</p>'di/ /'gro ba dngos 'dzin rlung nad gzir ba rnams kyis legs bsten pas/ /nyon mongs gdung bsal gzhan don mdangs rgyas ye shes sku thob shog /dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i sku la bstod pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
<p>117a.2</p>mi gnas rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAr+ya shrad+hA hUM ka ra warma dang zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o/[ ]@##/ //rgya gar skad du/ bo d+hi tsi t+ta pi ba ra Na TI kA/ bod skad du/ byang chub sems kyi
<p>117a.3</p>'grel pa'i rnam par bshad pa/ gcig dang du ma min sbyor ba/ /mkhyen nas rtog pa kun spangs pa'i/ /ston pa'i bdag nyid thugs rje can/ /btud nas rnam bshad 'di byas so/ /nga rgyal gyis sam grags dang rnyed/ /'dod nas brtsams pa ma yin te/ /dad
<p>117a.4</p>pas phyogs tsam byas 'di la/ /mkhas pas dpya yang bzod par gsol/ /de la 'di'i gleng gzhi ni ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes bsngags pa'i sgo nas spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor pha dang ma'i don du
<p>117a.5</p>bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i thabs rgyud kyi rgyal po gsang ba 'dus pa las/ dngos po thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i man ngag gi lung rtsa ba bstan to/ /de'i bsdus pa'i don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems
<p>117a.6</p>dang / /de bsgom par dam bca' ba dang / kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems dang / de gnyis rtogs par bya ba'i thabs so/ /de la don dam pa byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i rim pa la bzhi ste/ dngos po thams cad dang bral bas shes pa mu stegs kyi lta ba sun
<p>117a.7</p>dbyung ba bstan pa dang / phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa rnams sngangs zhes pas bye brag tu smra ba dang mdo sde pa'i lta ba sun dbyung ba dang / chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid ces pas sems tsam pa'i lta bsun dbyung ba dang / rang sems
<p>117b</p>
<p>117b.1</p>gdod nas ma skyes pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin zhes bya bas dbu ma pa'i lta ba grub nas rnam par gzhag pa dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pas don dam pa byang chub kyi sems bsgom par dam bca' ba bstan pa'o/ /kun rdzob byang
<p>117b.2</p>chub kyi sems bskyed pa la yang ma bsgral ba'i sems can rnams bsgral ba'i don dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig bzhis ngan song gsum dang / lha dang / mi dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
<p>117b.3</p>dpa' rnams rim pa bzhin du bsgral ba la sogs par bstan to/ /rtogs par bya ba'i thabs kyang gnyis te/ /smon pa ni 'di ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ste/ kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems so/ /bsgom pa ni don dam pa ni zhes bya ba
<p>117b.4</p>la sogs pa ste/ don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems te/ de ltar na rtsa ba'i don bcu gcig go/ /da ni de'i don rgyas par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ de nas zhes bya bas 'grel pa'i mgo brtsams pa ste/ de gang du/ gang gis/ gang las/ gang / gang gi phyir byas
<p>117b.5</p>she na/ dpal gyi ri bo la 'phags pa klu sgrub zhabs kyis/ gsang ba 'dus pa las/ dbu ma'i lta bar bsdus pa don dam pa dang kun rdzob byang chub sems gnyis yin la/ dgos pa phyi rol gyi lta ba bsal nas rang bzhin med pa'i ye shes dang snying rje gtsor bzhag
<p>117b.6</p>ste/ yi ge nyung ngus don gsal bar go rims su phyogs su byas nas 'grel to/ /de ltar na rtog pa sngon du byed pa'i gang zag la rtsis mgo lngas bstan to/ /de'i sa gcod ni bco lnga ste/ phyag 'tshal ba dang / dbu zhabs kyi don dang / bshad par dam bca'
<p>117b.7</p>ba dang / don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems cher gzhag pa'i don dang / dngos po thams cad dang bral ba 'grel ba'i don dang / phung po la sogs pa spang ba 'grel pa dang / chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid 'grel pa dang / rang gi sems ma skyes pa la sogs
<p>118a</p>
<p>118a.1</p>pa'i 'grel pa dang / kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems cher gzhag pa'i don dang / ma bsgral ba'i sems can bsgral ba la sogs pa'i 'grel pa'i don bzhi dang / byang chub kyi sems gnyis kyi yon tan dang / dge ba bsngo ba'o/ /de la phyag 'tshal
<p>118a.2</p>ba'i don ni byang chub kyi sems zhes pa nas bstan to/ /dbu zhabs kyi don ni byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa srid pa 'joms zhes pas so/ /bshad par dam bca' ba ni bdag gis bshad ces pas so/ /don dam pa byang chub kyi sems cher gzhag pa ni bdag dang zhes
<p>118a.3</p>pas so/ /dngos po thams cad dang bral ba'i 'grel pa ni mu stegs zhes pa nas so/ /phung po dang bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i 'grel pa ni 'jig rten bdag sogs zhes pa nas so/ /chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi 'grel pa ni sems tsam 'di zhes pa nas so/ /
<p>118a.4</p>rang gi sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i 'grel pa ni mtshan nyid med pa mi skye ba zhes bya ba nas so/ /kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems cher gzhag pa'i don ni de ltar sgom par byed pa na zhes bya ba nas so/ /ma bsgral ba sgrol ba'i 'grel pa ni gang gis dgongs pa zhes pa
<p>118a.5</p>nas so/ /ma bsgral ba'i 'grel pa ni sems can bsgral ba'i zhes pa nas so/ /dbugs dbyung ba'i 'grel pa ni theg pa chen po zhes bya ba nas so/ /mya ngan las zlo ba'i 'grel pa ni gzungs rnams zhes pa nas so/ /byang chub kyi sems gnyis kyi yon tan ni phyag rgya
<p>118a.6</p>zhes pa nas so/ /bsngo ba ni rgyal ba zhes pa nas bstan to/ /da ni rtsa 'grel de'i 'bru gnon te/ de la re zhig mu stegs pa sun dbyung ba'i dngos po thams cad dang bral ba zhes pa ste/ de la dngos po thams cad ni phyi dang nang ngo / /de la nang gi dngos po bcu drug
<p>118a.7</p>bshad pa/ bdag dang sems can srog dang ni/ /skye ba gso ba skyes bu dang / /gang zag shed skyes shed bu dang / /byed po byed du 'jug tshor ba/ /shes mthong slong ba kun slong rnams/ phyi rol dngos po bum rnams dang / /re lde la sogs rdzas mtha' yas/ /
<p>118b</p>
<p>118b.1</p>de yod pas don byed phyir ro/ /thams cad ces bya ba ni skye mched bcu gnyis kyi bdag nyid grangs med la shes par bya ste/ grangs dang bcas pa ni ma yin no/ /dngos po yang de thams cad kyang de nyid pas dngos po thams cad ces bya'o/ /de ltar yang kye bram ze
<p>118b.2</p>thams cad ces bya ba ni skye mched bcu gnyis kho na'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nyid kyi dpyad pa la med pas na bral ba ste dngos po rnams ma brtags na gcig tu nyams dga' ba'i phyir ro/ /bye brag tu smra ba dang mdo sde pa sun 'byin pa ni phung po zhes bya ba sogs pa ste/ 
<p>118b.3</p>de la phung po ni gzugs la sogs pa ste spungs pa'i phyir ro/ /de yang dus gsum gyi gzugs bzang ngan dang / che phra yod do cog gcig tu spungs pa dang / de bzhin du bde ba la sogs pa myong ba rnams dang / 'di ni dkar po zhes bya ba la sogs pa kha
<p>118b.4</p>dog dang / ring po la sogs pa dbyibs dang / bzang po la sogs pa bye brag mtshan mar 'dzin pa rnams dang / dus gsum pa'i sems las byung ba rnams dang / mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / dus gsum gyi yul tha dad pa la shes pa'i rnam par
<p>118b.5</p>shes pa/ shes pa'i tshogs bdun po rnams gcig tu spungs pa'i rnam par shes pa ste phung po lnga'o/ /khams ni mig la sogs pa'i khams bco brgyad de/ spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir dang / rigs kyi don 'dzin pa'i phyir dang / srid pa'i
<p>118b.6</p>sa bon yin pa'i phyir khams so/ /skye mched ni mig la sogs pa'i skye mched bcu gnyis te/ rnam par shes pa bskyed cing 'phel bar byed pas na skye mched do/ /gzung 'dzin ni phyi'i gzugs la sogs pa'i skye mched drug dang / nang gi mig la sogs pa skye
<p>118b.7</p>mched drug la sems tsam pas kun du brtag pa'i ming ste/ dbang pos spyod yul du gzung ba'i phyir dang / dbang po 'dzin mkhan yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de rnams don dam par rdzas su med par spangs te/ 'og nas kyang 'byung ba'i/ gzugs ni dbu ba 'dra zhes
<p>119a</p>
<p>119a.1</p>brjod/ /ces bya ba la sogs pas 'grel to/ /sems tsam pa'i lta ba sun dbyung ba ni chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ste/ de la chos ni mdor na phung po lnga ste/ spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pas na lung las kyang / mtshan nyid 'dzin
<p>119a.2</p>pas na chos zhes bya zhe'o/ /bdag med ces bya ba ni sbrul gyi pags pa brje ba ltar lus kyi phung po'i nang na/ phung po snga ma 'dor zhing / phyi ma len pa brtag pa'i ngo bo dang nga yir 'dzin pa'i gzhi/ bdag ces bya bar mu stegs pas brtags pa'o/ /de dang
<p>119a.3</p>'dra bar sangs rgyas pa'i chos dang / mu stegs pa'i chos bdag bsal nas rnam par rig pa tsam du gzhag pa'o/ /de ji ltar phung po dang bdag med pa de bzhin du rnam par rig pa yang med par 'dra bas na chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ste/ 'og nas/ 
<p>119a.4</p>sems tsam 'di yis sna tshogs su/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'grel to/ /de ltar dngos po la sogs par lta ba bsal nas/ dbu ma'i don cher gzhag pa ni/ /rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa/ /zhes pa ste don dam par rang gi sems tsam yang mi skye ste yod med
<p>119a.5</p>dbus las 'das pa'i phyir ro/ /'di ltar mu stegs pa'i dbang phyug la sogs pas byas pa lta bu ma yin pa/ gdod nas ma skyes pa sems dang po nas yod zin pa cig yin na ni skye mi dgos la dngos po med na med pa ji ltar skye ba mi sbyor ba'o/ /de ltar yod
<p>119a.6</p>pa dang med pa'i mtha' med ma thag tu dbu mar skye ba mi dmigs so/ /'o na ji lta bu zhig gi ngo bo nyid yin zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin te/ dngos po med pa nam mkha' lta bu'o/ /'di lta ste/ nam mkha' nam mkha' zhes tha snyad la yod kyang / dpyad na stong pa yin
<p>119a.7</p>pa'i phyir ro/ /de ltar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las/ rnal 'byor nam mkha' bsgom pa ni/ /ji skad du gsungs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po bsgom pa zhes gsungs so/ /don dam par byang chub kyi sems bsgom par dam bca' ba bstan par bya ba ni/ 
<p>119b</p>
<p>119b.1</p>ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste de la ji ltar zhes bya ba ni dpe 'dren pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyang yin la bcom ldan 'das kyang yin pas so/ /de la sangs rgyas
<p>119b.2</p>ni skyes bu sad pa ltar ma rig pa'i gnyid sad nas pad+ma kha bye ba ltar chos rnams khong du chud pas thugs rgyas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni nyan thos kyi theg pa las bdud bzhi bcom pa ste/ 'di ltar ma rig pa'i zag pa zad nas nyon mongs pa'i bdud bcom pa
<p>119b.3</p>ste/ nyon mongs pa kun ni ma rig pa las 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ /srid pa'i zag pa zad pas 'chi bdag gi bdud bcom pa ste 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal spangs pas chags pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ /lta ba'i zag pa zad pas phung po'i bdud bcom pa ste nye bar len pa'i phung
<p>119b.4</p>po ni 'jig tshogs su lta ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'dod pa'i zag pa zad pas lha'i bu'i bdud bcom ste phyin ci log pa'i 'dod chags spangs pa'i phyir ro/ /de ltar bdud bzhi bcom nas zad pa dang mi skye bshes pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'o/ /yang na byang chub sems dpa'i
<p>119b.5</p>theg pa la dbul po dang / ngan song dang / gzugs mi sdug pa dang / grags pa med pa dang / dpal med pa dang / ma rig pa rnams pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis rim pa bzhin du bcom ste/ 'bras bu dbang phyug dang / rab mchog dang / gzugs bzang dang / grags
<p>119b.6</p>pa dang / dpal dang / ye shes dang ldan pa'o/ /yang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa'i sems tsam la de bzhin nyid dang stobs bcu mngon du gyur pas kun gzhi dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa bcom ste me long lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'
<p>119b.7</p>mi 'jigs pa bzhi mngon du gyur pas nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa bcom ste mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang ldan pa dang / mtshan ma med par so so yang dag par rig pa mngon du gyur pas rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par shes pa dang / las
<p>120a</p>
<p>120a.1</p>kyi sgrib pa bcom ste so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa dang / don dam pa dang snying rje chen po mngon sum du gyur pas 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa dang / skye ba'i sgrib pa bcom ste bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhi ni zad pa'i ye shes te
<p>120a.2</p>de kho na'i phyir skyes pa ni mi skye ba shes pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa dbu ma ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyis shes bya'i sgrib pa la sogs pa thams cad bcom ste/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas na
<p>120a.3</p>bcom ldan 'das so/ /de yang mu bzhi ste/ mu dang po sangs rgyas yin la bcom ldan 'das ma yin pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas te/ sbyin pa la sogs pa drug mi spyod pas legs pa drug dang mi ldan pa'o/ /mu gnyis pa bcom ldan 'das yin la sangs rgyas
<p>120a.4</p>ma yin pa ni sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams te/ thugs rje'i dbang gis 'khor bam spangs pa'i phyir ro/ /mu gsum pa gnyis ka yin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste pha rol tu phyin pa mthar phyin nas mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la zhugs pa'i
<p>120a.5</p>phyir ro/ /mu bzhi pa gnyis ka ma yin pa ni so so'i skye bo rnams so/ /de lta bas na sangs rgyas dang bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi tshig gnyis gcig tu byas pa'i sgra las de bzhin gshegs pa la shes par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba ni byang
<p>120a.6</p>chub sems dpa' yang yin la sems dpa' chen po yang yin pas sems dpa'i sgra gcig mi mngon par byas nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes bya bar 'dod do/ /de la byang chub ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so/ /de bsgom pa'i
<p>120a.7</p>sems brtan pas sems dpa' ste/ mu stegs pa las khyad par du ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa'i phyir ro/ /chen po ni mtha' yas pa'i sems can gyi don chen po byed pa ste/ nyan thos las khyad par du bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa'i phyir ro/ /
<p>120b</p>
<p>120b.1</p>yang na yum las che ba bdun dang ldan pas kyang ste/ sems can chen po'i nang nas mchog tu gyur pa dang / sems can gyi khams chen po'i log pa'i lta ba gcod pa dang / sbyin pa dang / blo dang / mthu che ba dang / theg pa chen po la gnas pa dang / go cha chen po bgos
<p>120b.2</p>nas kyang bdud 'joms par byed pa'o/ /de yang mu bzhi ste byang chub sems dpa' min la/ sems dpa' chen po ma yin pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas te sems can gyi don mi byed pa'i phyir ro/ /chen po yin la byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa ni phyi rol pa'i
<p>120b.3</p>ston pa lha chen po rnams te nyon mongs pa ma spangs pa'i phyir ro/ /gnyis ka yin pa dang ma yin pa ni snga ma yin no/ /de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chen po ni sa bcu pa rnams la bya'o/ /de dag gis zhes pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa'
<p>120b.4</p>chen po la mtshon pa'o/ /byang chub ni dam tshig chen po rdo rje lta bu'i de kho na nyid mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste zad pa dang mi skye ba'i rang bzhin ye shes lnga'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ zad pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs
<p>120b.5</p>pa bzhis ni byang la mi skye ba'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis chub pa rdzogs par byas pa'o/ /yang na chos thams cad phyin ci ma log par bslab par rtog pa ni byang chub ste thams cad mtshan nyid do/ /de nyid chen po ste 'og ma gnyis dang yang dag
<p>120b.6</p>par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phye ba'i phyir ro/ /de la sems bskyed pa ni bsgom pa'i stobs kyis sems gnyis su med par mngon du byas pa'o/ /de ltar zhes bya ba ni don gyi mgo 'dren pa'o/ /bdag gis zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi sgor zhugs pa'i
<p>120b.7</p>rnal 'byor pa'o/ /kyang gi sgras ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' gcig pur ma zad de zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go/ /dus ni phung po lnga'i ngo bo ste skad cig la 'jig cing mi rtag pa'i phyir ro/ /'di zhes bya ba ni mngon du mtshon pa'o/ /
<p>121a</p>
<p>121a.1</p>bzung nas zhes pa ni dang du len pa'o/ /mdor bsdu na dus 'di nas bzung nas zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang slob dpon gyi spyan sngar dam bcas pa'i dus la shes par bya'o/ /ji snyed ces bya ba ni mtha' yas pa'i dus la snyegs pa'i sgra'o/ /
<p>121a.2</p>byang chub ni bshad pa nyid do/ /de'i snying po ni byang chub snying po ste rang bzhin gyi don 'dod pa bsgrub pa'i phyir ro/ /la zhes pa ni rten gnas brtan pa'o/ /gnas pa ni mngon du gyur pa'o/ /rab tu zhes pa ni dus mthar phyin pa'i tshad bstan pa'o/ /lhag ma ni bshad
<p>121a.3</p>zin to/ /da ni kun rdzob byang chub sems kyis sems can ma bsgral ba rnams bdag gis bsgral lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud las sil bu bstan pa las/ 'dir mu gcig tu byas pa las re zhig ngan song gsum bsgral ba'i don ni
<p>121a.4</p>ma bsgral ba'i sems can rnams zhes te/ ma bsgral ba yang yin la sems can yang yin pas na ma bsgral ba'i sems can te ngan song gsum mo/ /de la ma bsgral ba ni sdug bsngal gyis gzir bas dge ba'i sems kyi dran pa nyams te ngan song gsum las mi thar pa'i
<p>121a.5</p>phyir ro/ /sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal ni 'di lta ste/ tsha grang dang bkres skom la sogs pa'o/ /kun gzhi dang ldan pa ste dge mi dge'i las sems kyis sdud pas na sems can te lang kar gshegs pa las/ las ni sems kyis sdud par byed/ /yid kyis kyang
<p>121a.6</p>ni rnam par rtog /las ni mthong bar rtogs pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de rnams lha dang mi thob par byed pas na bsgral ba ste/ cho 'phrul chen po'i mthus sdug bsngal bcom nas dge ba'i sems bskyed par bya ste/ dper na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi
<p>121a.7</p>dbang phyug tsha ba'i dmyal bar gshegs nas dmyal ba'i sa gzhi mtshor bsgyur ba la sogs pa lta bu ste 'dir smras pa/ thugs rje che ldan dmyal bar ched du gshegs/ /sa gzhi mtshor bsgyur pad+ma rnams kyang skyes/ /tsha ba rnams ni sdug bsngal nyid bral te/ /
<p>121b</p>
<p>121b.1</p>dge ba'i sems kyis bran pa skyed par mdzad/ /de bzhin khab kyi mchu can la sogs pa'i/ /kha la phyag gis bdud rtsi'i rgyun phab nas/ /bkres skom bcom nas dge ba'i sems la bkod/ /bung ba la sogs gzugs kyis skal mnyam du/ /dkon mchog mtshan
<p>121b.2</p>brjod dge ba thob par mdzad/ /ces za ma tog gi mdo las bstan pa bzhin no/ /don zhes bya ba ni sems bskyed pa'i dgos pa'o/ /lha dang mi'i don ni ma grol ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste/ 'dod chags la sogs pas bcings pa'i phyir ro/ /de dag
<p>121b.3</p>la ma chags pa dang byams pa dang yang dag pa'i lta ba bskyed nas 'khor ba las thar bar byas pa ni sgrol ba ste thar pa'i cha la bskyed pa'o/ /nyan thos la sogs pa dbugs dbyung ba'i don ni dbugs ma phyung ba'o zhes pa ste/ sems dang sems las
<p>121b.4</p>byung ba'i chos bkag nas shin tu stong pa la gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /de dag la theg pa chen po'i don bstan nas te/ 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa bsal ba ni dbugs dbyung ba ste gzhan don la btsud pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'da' ba ni yongs
<p>121b.5</p>su zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste thugs rje'i dbang gis 'khor ba la gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /de dag la mi dmigs pa'i snying rje chen po bstan pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ste/ yongs su ma lus pa'i go 'phang mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /
<p>121b.6</p>kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya ba'i thabs bstan pa ni de ltar zhes bya ba gnas te/ de ltar zhes bya ba'i tshig gis 'das ma thag pa mtshon pa'o/ /kun rdzob kyi chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa las/ 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad kun la tshig dang yi ge
<p>121b.7</p>bstan pa'i sgo nas 'jug pa de'i cha ni kun rdzob kyi rnam pa zhes bya ba ste bye brag tu 'byed do/ /de smon pa byang chub kyi ngo bo bskyed nas zhes bya ba la/ /de la smon pa ni don du gnyer ba'i ngo bo ste gzhan gyi don du bdag sangs rgyas par 'dod pa'i phyir ro/ /smon pa des bskyed
<p>122a</p>
<p>122a.1</p>pa'i byang chub kyi sems shes te mi dmigs pa'i snying rje chen po'o/ /de'i rang bzhin ni ngo bo ste snying rje chen po'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i don to/ /de smon pa'i sgo nas rkyen bzhis 'dus byas pa ni bskyed pa ste yid la mngon du byas pa'o/ /don dam pa byang
<p>122a.2</p>chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i sgo nas bskyed pa'i thabs bstan pa ni don dam pa ni zhes bya ba nas te/ de la don dam pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes dam pas dmigs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad med pa mya ngan las 'das pa ste 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul lo/ /
<p>122a.3</p>de'i phyir byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o zhes pa dang 'brel to/ /de ji ltar bskyed par bya zhe na/ de ni bsgom pa'i stobs kyis te/ de la bsgom pa chos nyid la mnyam par gzhag pa'i yon tan sems la chags par byed pa'o/ /de'i nus pa'i khyad par/ 
<p>122a.4</p>ni stobs te ye shes kyi stobs so/ /byang chub kyi sems de gnyis gang gis bskyed ce na/ de bstan pa ni sngags kyi sgo nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste/ de la sngags ni shes skyob ste/ /rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang snying rje'i rang bzhin gsungs nas bzlas pa'i
<p>122a.5</p>phyir ro/ /de dang po nas dang du len pa'i sems ni sngags kyi sgo nas spyad pa spyod pa ste de la dang po 'jug pa'i theg pa ni sgo'o/ /dam tshig gi sdom pa srung zhing zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang yig 'bru la sogs pa bsgom pa'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa ni spyad pa'o/ /
<p>122a.6</p>de rtse gcig tu bsgom pa ni spyod pa'o/ /sngags kyi sgo nas spyad pa spyod pa yang yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang yin pas na/ sngags kyi sgo nas spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ste rnal 'byor pho mo la bya'o/ /de dag gis kyang byang chub sems brtan
<p>122a.7</p>par byed pas na rgyu la 'bras bu'i ming btags pa'o/ /yang na bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la shes par bya'o/ /da ni chos 'di'i 'grel pa rtsom pa ni/ de nas de'i ngo bo nyid bshad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste de nas zhes bya ba ni rtsa 'grel
<p>122b</p>
<p>122b.1</p>la sogs mjug sbrel ba'i tshig go/ /yang na bkra shis kyi tshig ste yi ge thams cad kyi mchog a yin pa'i phyir/ a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog /ces 'byung ba'o/ /de'i zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba las mtshon pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid ni rtsa ba'i rang bzhin no/ /bshad pa ni 'grel pa'o/ /
<p>122b.2</p>de la re zhig rtog pa mngon du byed pa'i sems dad pa bskyed pa dang / rang gi bya ba 'di la bar chad zhi bar gyur nas mthar phyin par bya ba dang / rang gi ston pa bcom ldan 'das kyi che ba'i yon tan brjod par 'dod nas/ 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis phyag 'tshal ba gsungs pa ni
<p>122b.3</p>byang chub sems kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste/ de la byang chub sems ni stong pa chen po rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes te/ chos thams cad phyin ci ma log par lhag par rtogs pa'i phyir ro/ /de'i rang bzhin du gyur pa ni byang chub sems kyi bdag nyid ces pa ste/ bdag gi
<p>122b.4</p>sgras ni rang bzhin la shes par bya ba'i bdag nyid du lta ba ni ma yin no/ /de'i rnam par smin pa dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rten mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo ni byang chub sems kyi bdag nyid gzugs zhes te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i
<p>122b.5</p>sku phyag rgya chen po'o/ /de ni ye shes kyi tshogs rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa'i sgo nas bstod pa'o/ /yang dpal ldan de lha'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /yang na rdo rje sems dpa'i sku phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pas na dpal ldan no/ /de ni
<p>122b.6</p>bsod nams kyi tshogs gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i sgo nas bstod pa'o/ /rdo rje ni ye shes lnga dang rigs lnga'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid do/ /des phyin ci log gi nyon mongs pa bcom pas na mtshon cha'o/ /de ye shes kyi rtags su phyag na ldan pas
<p>122b.7</p>can zhes bya'o/ /de ni phyag mtshan gyi sgo nas bstod pa'o/ /btud pa ni lus la sogs pas phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /de la rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i sgo nas bstod pa'o/ /yan lag lngas sa la rig par thal mo sbyar ba dang / sems la mdun du byas
<p>123a</p>
<p>123a.1</p>pa'i tshul gyis so/ /da ni dbu zhabs kyi don du gsungs te/ byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa srid pa 'joms zhes te byang chub sems bsgom pa ni bshad zin to/ /de ci 'dra zhe na srid pa 'joms pa ste/ de la srid pa ni nye bar len gyi phung po lnga'i rang bzhin
<p>123a.2</p>'dod pa dang / gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i srid pa ste 'byung zhing 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de rang bzhin gyis sgyu ma dang 'dra bar shes pa'i srid pa 'joms pa ste chos thams cad phyin ci ma log par rtogs pa'o/ /bshad par dam bca' ba ni bdag gis bshad ces
<p>123a.3</p>gsungs te/ 'phags pa klu sgrub bdag gis tshig gi gnas lnga dang ldan par 'grel pa'o/ /de gang zhe na/ nges pa'i tshig dang / de'i rgyu dang / dpe dang / nye bar 'gro ba dang / nges par 'gro ba'o/ /don dam byang chub kyi sems cher gzhag pa'i don ni/ bdag
<p>123a.4</p>dang phung po zhes pa nas te/ bdag dang phung po ni snga ma bzhin no/ /sogs pa zhes pa ni gnyis ka la mtshon pa yin te/ bdag la sogs pa ni sems can la sogs pa bco lnga'o/ /phung po la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste/ 
<p>123a.5</p>'jig rten gyi rdul phra rab ji snyed dang mnyam pa rdo rje theg pa'i sgo nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te/ snga ma ltar sang pa dang rgyas pa'i phyir ro/ /de yang mu gsum ste dang po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
<p>123a.6</p>sangs rgyas yin la bla na med pa ma yin pa ni theg pa chen po mdo sde'i sgo nas sangs rgyas te rdo rje'i theg pa bla na yod pa'i phyir ro/ /gnyis pa gnyis ka yin pa ni gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i sangs rgyas te mthar thug pa'i phyir ro/ /mu gsum pa gnyis ka ma yin
<p>123a.7</p>pa ni theg pa chung ngu'i sangs rgyas te theg pa chen po gang na yod pa'i phyir dang shes bya'i sgrib pa ma spangs pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de lta bu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis byang chub sems 'dod ces 'brel lo/ /de'i mtshan nyid ci 'dra zhe
<p>123b</p>
<p>123b.1</p>na stong pa'i mtshan nyid de'i rang bzhin med pa la spyi'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig go/ /rtag tu zhes pa ni rgyun mi 'chad pa ste skad cig ma la skye zhing 'jig pa'i dus gsum mo/ /'dod pa ni don dam par dbu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi lta bar phye nas 'dod pa'o/ /byang chub sems de ji
<p>123b.2</p>ltar bsgom zhe na/ snying rjes brlan pa'i zhes pa nas te/ snying rje ni rnam par 'tshe ba'i gnyen po ste zhe sdang med pa'i ngo bo sdug bsngal dang de'i rgyu dang bral bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /de yang don gyi rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i snying rje chen po ste/ 'di ltar rang bzhin
<p>123b.3</p>dang / rnam pa dang / dmigs pa dang / sa dang / rigs dang / rnyed pa dang / skyabs med pa la skyabs sbyin pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /de la rang bzhin ni dus gsum med pa'i rang bzhin no/ /rnam pa ni sdug bsngal gsum pa snying rje ba'o/ /dmigs
<p>123b.4</p>pa ni gcig nas khams gsum gyi sems can la snying rje ba'o/ /sa ni mi lcogs pa med pa dang / bsam gtan khyad par can dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa la snying rje ba'i phyir ro/ /rigs ni nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba dang so so'i skye bo la snying rje pa'o/ /rnyed pa ni 'dod
<p>123b.5</p>pa dang srid pa'i rtse mo'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba las thob pa'o/ /skyabs sbyin pa ni 'khor ba chen pos 'jigs pa la'o/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ni grangs med pa'i sems can thams cad la snying rje ba'i phyir ro/ /des 'jam par gyur pa ni snying rjes brlan pa ste/ khong
<p>123b.6</p>khro ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /snying rjes brlan pa yang de nyid sems kyang de nyid pas snying rjes brlan pa'i sems te/ sems can sdug bsngal ba dang de'i rgyu dang bral bar byed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi bag chags so/ /kyis zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'o/ /ni'i sgra ni nges pa'i
<p>123b.7</p>don bstan pa'o/ /nan tan ni phyin ci ma log par bsgom pa la brtan pa'o/ /bsgom par bya zhes pa ni byang chub sems la mnyam par gzhag pa'i yon tan sems la goms par byed pa'o/ /byang chub kyi sems de dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyis bsgoms
<p>124a</p>
<p>124a.1</p>zhes so/ /bstan pa ni sangs rgyas snying rje'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /nga ni sngar dngos po thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba de 'grel pa ni mu stegs rnams kyi zhes bya ba nas te/ mu stegs pa ni bye brag pa la sogs pa'o/ /de dag gis med pa'i
<p>124a.2</p>phyin ci log par sgro 'dogs pa ni btags pa ste bdag yod do zhes smra'o/ /gang gi sgra ni spyir bstan pa ste/ bdag dang gang zag la sogs pa gang yang rung ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go/ /de dang gang dang 'brel pa de'o/ /rigs pa ni mngon sum la sogs pa'o/ /de yang
<p>124a.3</p>mngon sum ni rtog pa dang bral zhing ma 'khrul ba ste dbang po la sogs pa'o/ /rjes su dpag pa ni tshul gsum la sogs pas dpyad pa ste rang gi don la sogs pa'o/ /brtag pa ni dpyad pa'o/ /rig pas dpyad na 'dir 'gyur te/ phung po kun gyi nang na ni/ /bdag po
<p>124a.4</p>'ga' yang mi rnyed do/ /snod la rdzas gzhag pa ltar ram de dang tha mi dad pa'i bdag kyang med do zhes bstan pa'o/ /de nyid rtag pa dad ni phung po yod pa ste mi rtag rkyen gyi dbang du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de dang 'dra ba'i bdag gzugs min/ /phung po ltar mi rtag pa
<p>124a.5</p>bdag gi ngo bo ma yin te/ lus kyi phung po brje ba la gcig zhugs nas rgyun mi 'chad par rtag par bdag ces mu stegs pa 'dod do/ /de lta bsan phung po gang yin na bdag yin zhes tha mi dad par grub pa ma yin no/ /'o na snod du gzhag pa'i rdzas ltar grub po zhe na/ 
<p>124a.6</p>rten dang brten pa'i tshul gyis kyang / /rtag dang mi rtag 'ga' yang med/ /rten ni snod lta bu ste phung po'o/ /brten pa ni rdzas lta bu ste bdag go/ /de lta bu'i tshul gyis kyang rtag pa dang ni mi rtag pa med de bde ba dang / sdug bsngal lhan cig tu mi gnas pa ltar rtag pa ni mi
<p>124a.7</p>rtag pa dang lhan cig tu mi gnas pa'i phyir bdag ces bya ba med do/ /de ltar bdag ma grub na gang zag la sogs pa mi 'grub pas na/ bdag ces bya ba de med pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste/ de la byed pa ni byed pa po dang byed du 'jug pa po la sogs pa'o/ /ci'i
<p>124b</p>
<p>124b.1</p>phyir zhe na/ chos can yod na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste/ bdag chos can byed mkhan grub na byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa po la sogs pa'i chos yod du chug na bdag med pa la sogs pa'i chos yod par ga la 'gyur te mi 'gyur ro/ /de la chos can ni bdag ste
<p>124b.2</p>bdag po'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir ro/ /chos rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bdag gir 'dzin pa'i chos rnams so/ /'jig rten ni 'khor ba ste skye zhing 'jig pas mi rtag pa'o/ /bsam pa 'jug pa'i chos can yod na yod la chos yod na chos can yod ces
<p>124b.3</p>nges par rtogs pa'o/ /de ltar bdag sun phyung nas brtags pa sun 'byin pa ni rim gyis zhes bya ba nas de la rim ni snga phyi'o/ /cig car ni dus gcig tu'o/ /ci phyir rtag don byas pa med/ /rtag pa ni rang bzhin dang dbang phyug la sogs pa ste/ gnas skabs su chos
<p>124b.4</p>gzhan dang gzhan du gyur na yang rdzas de bzhin du gnas par 'dod pa'i phyir ro/ /des bskyed par bya ba'i 'bras bu ni don te phyi'i dngos po'o/ /de yang rig pas brtags na brtag pa'i don med de rgyu rkyen la rag las pa'i phyir ro/ /cig car yang mi 'grub ste/ snga
<p>124b.5</p>phyir 'jig rten tha dad nas 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ /de bas na phyi dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste phyi ni bdag gir 'dzin pa bum pa la sogs pa'o/ /nang ni bdag la sogs pa'o/ /gal te rgyu rkyen la bsdad pa yin no zhe na/ gal te nus na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste de
<p>124b.6</p>la gal te ni brgya lam na'o/ /nus pa ni mthu'i khyad par ro/ /ci ste ni dri ba'o/ /ltos pa ni bsdad pa'o/ /de'i zhes pa ni brtag pa'o/ /dngos po kun ni 'jig rten gyi khams so/ /dus gcig bskyed pa ni tha mi dad par lhan cig byas pa'o/ /gal te zhes bya ba ni rim pa gzhan
<p>124b.7</p>bsnyag pa'o/ /gzhan la ltos pa yin na zhes bya ba ni rgyu rkyen la bsnyad pa'o/ /de bas na/ rtag dang nus pa dang ldan min/ /zhes te dus gcig tu byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang rgyu la ltos pa'i phyir ro/ /de lta bas na gal te dngos po brtags pa nyid med de/ /rig pas
<p>125a</p>
<p>125a.1</p>brtags na dngos po thams cad mi rtag par 'gyur ba'o/ /mi rtag pa de ma thag pa dngos po skad cig la skad cig ma re re la skye zhing 'jig pa'i phyir ro/ /de la rtag tu zhes bya ba ni dus gsum la rgyu 'bras nyid du rgyu byas pa'i rgyu de mu stegs pa'i rtag pa shes par bya
<p>125a.2</p>ba'o/ /dngos po zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to/ /skad cig ma ni dus kyi mtha' ste rtsal po che'i se gol gcig la dus kyi cha drug cu rtsa lnga 'gag pa'i phyir ro/ /de lta bas na dngos po mi rtag pa'i phyir byed pa gang gis mi slu'o zhes te/ de la mi rtag pa'i skad cig la skye zhing 'jig pa
<p>125a.3</p>ste ngo bo zin ma thag 'das pa'i phyir ro/ /byed pa ni dbang phyug la sogs pa'o/ /gang gis slu'o zhes bya ba ni bden pa dang ldan pa'i lta ba gang gis kyang zlog par mi byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go/ /de ltar mu stegs pa'i lta ba bkag nas nyan thos kyi lta ba gtso bor gzhag pa
<p>125a.4</p>gsungs pa ni/ gzugs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste/ de la gzugs ni thog pa dang bcas shing reg tu yod pa'i phyir ro/ /de yang bcu gcig ste dbang po lnga dang / yul lnga dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs so/ /tshor ba ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang btang
<p>125a.5</p>snyoms te/ de yang mig gi 'dus te reg pa la sogs pa bco brgyad do/ /'du shes ni mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid do/ /'du byed ni phung po bzhi las gzhan pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /ldan pa ma yin pa'i gzugs dang sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos grangs
<p>125a.6</p>med pas so/ /phung po lnga char 'du byed yin pa la/ 'di gcig pu la 'du byed kyi phung por ci'i phyir gdags she na/ gzugs dang / sems dang sems gang yang ma yin pa 'du byed pa tsam ldan pa ma yin pa bcu bzhi'o/ /rnam par shes pa
<p>125a.7</p>ni so sor rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid de mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa drug dang yid do/ /de rnams phung po lnga zhes te bzhi dang drug sun phyung ba lha sbyin gyis smras pa ltar phung po drug med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsungs pa ni theg pa chung ngu las dus gsum dang / gtam
<p>125b</p>
<p>125b.1</p>bzhi dang / nges par 'byung ba dang bzhi dang bcas pa yang phung po lnga zhes pa bstan pa'i phyir ro/ /ci'i phyir bstan ce na nyan thos rnams la phan 'dogs pa ste/ nyan thos ni dgra bcom pa'i sangs rgyas te ston pa la nyan cing thos nas nges par 'byed pa'i cha bzhi tshe gcig
<p>125b.2</p>la mngon du grub pa'i phyir ro/ /phan pa ni phyis legs pa'o/ /da ni/ phung po khams dang skye mched dang / /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/ /zhes pa'i 'grel pa ni/ 'jig rten bdag sogs med pa la/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ sogs pa'i sgras ni
<p>125b.3</p>gang zag la sogs pa bco lnga bsdu'o/ /dpyad na ma grub pa ni med pa'o/ /de 'dra ba'i phung po tsam yang gzhom par bya ste/ theg pa chen po la phung po lnga bkag nas khams gsum la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnam par rig pa tsam du gzhag pa'o/ /phung po kho na bkag
<p>125b.4</p>par ma zad kyi khams dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa dag kyang ste ji ltar gzhag ce na/ /gzugs ni dbu ba 'dra zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste/ rang bzhin gyis nyam chung bas dbu ba ste reg tu med pa'i phyir ro/ /de ltar gzugs kyang ngo / /byung ma thag tu 'jig pa ni chu
<p>125b.5</p>bur te tshor ba yang bde ba byung ma thag tu sdug bsngal 'byung bas so/ /snang ba yang med pas smig rgyu ste/ de bzhin du 'du shes kyang ka ba zhes bya ba rtse mo dang / dbus dang / rtsa bar phye na de'i 'du shes med pa'o/ /snying po med pas chu shing ste/ /'du byed kyang 'khor
<p>125b.6</p>ba'i chos su phyi rol du snang yang snying po med de rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba tsam yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhan slu bas na sgyu ma ste/ /de bzhin du rnam par shes pa yang shes pa dang shes bya med pa la shes pa bzhin snang ba'i phyir ro/ /de ltar phung po zhes bya ba la sogs pa
<p>125b.7</p>bstan pa ni bslab par bya ba'i chos so/ /thams cad du zhes pa ni rnam pa tha dad pa ma lus pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni sa bcu pa rnams la'o/ /la zhes bya ba ni yul lo/ /bstan pa ni rjes su slob pa'o/ /de ltar phung po lnga'i rang bzhin med par bstan to zhes
<p>126a</p>
<p>126a.1</p>bya ba yin no/ /dbu ba la sogs pa rnams gang zhe na/ 'byung ba chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te sa la sogs pa ni gzugs che phra yod do cog gi 'byung gnas dang gzugs kun la spyi'i mtshan nyid kyis khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bas na nam mkha' ni
<p>126a.2</p>'byung ba ma yin te kun du khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de rnams las byung ba'i chos ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i dngos gzhi'o/ /de ni/ gzugs kyi phung por rab tu gsal/ /zhes bya ste gsal ba ni mngon du gyur pa'o/ /gzugs med nyid du gzhan rnams ni/ /zhes pa ni ming
<p>126a.3</p>bzhi'i phung po'o/ /gzugs las gzhan gzugs med pa ste thogs pa med cing gzung du med pa'i phyir ro/ /de ltar phung po lnga'i nang na gcig ni gzugs dang bzhi ni gzugs ma yin pa som nyi med par gsal bar ni the tshom med pa ste phung po bzhi ni sems dang sems
<p>126a.4</p>las byung ba'i chos yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gzugs dang gzugs ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid las khams la sogs pa yang gzhan ma yin pa ni khams zhes brjod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /'o na dbu ba dang 'dra ba'i gzugs ni rdzas su 'dod pa ma yin te ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
<p>126a.5</p>gzugs kyi mtha' rdul phra rab rdzas su 'dod do zhe na/ gzugs dang gzugs med kyi rdul phran/ /zhes pa la sogs pa ste/ gzugs kyi mtha' ma'i cha ni rdul phran te/ thogs pa med cing mdun rgyab kyi cha med pa'o/ /de yang gnyis te bsags pa'i rdul phra rab dang
<p>126a.6</p>rdzas kyi rdul phra rab po/ /dang po ni brgyad dang dgu dang bcu bsags pa'i phyir ro/ /de la brgyad bsags pa ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang / gzugs dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rnams te brgyad phan tshun bsags nas 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ /dgu bsags
<p>126a.7</p>pa ni sgra ste gong ma rnams dang sgra nyid bsags pa'i phyir ro/ /bcu bsags pa ni lus la sogs pa'i dbang po ste/ gong ma dgu dang lus la sogs pa nyid bsags nas 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ /rdzas kyi rdul phra rab ni gcig pur snang ba'o/ /rdzas kyi rdul phra rab des mig
<p>126b</p>
<p>126b.1</p>la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni bskyed mi nus pas/ gzugs kyi rdul phran dbang shes min/ /rdul phra rab de dbang pos mi sod pa'i phyir ro/ /de la dbang po ni bag byed pa dang rten mdzes par byed pa dang / rang rang gi spyod yul la dbang byed pa dang / rang rang gi
<p>126b.2</p>rnam par shes pa bskyed par bya ba rnams la dbang byed pa'i phyir ro/ /de'i shes pa ni tshogs drug gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /min zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'o/ /de'i gtan tshigs gsungs pa ni/ bskyed pas 'das pa ma yin la/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa
<p>126b.3</p>ste dbang po lnga las 'das pa'i spyod yul gyi rnam par shes pa bskyed pa'i don mi nus pa'i phyir ro/ /'o na/ gang gis bskyed ce na/ /de dag 'dus pa las skye ste rdul phra rab de dag brgyad la sogs pa 'dus pa bum pa dang / snam bu la sogs pa'i spyod yul gyis mig la
<p>126b.4</p>sogs pa'i rnam shes skyed par byed kyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/ /'dus pa de yang 'dod pa min/ /bum snam la sogs pa lta bu rdul phra rab 'dus pa'i spyod yul ni don dam pa'i rdzas su mi 'dod pa ste ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir ro/ /
<p>126b.5</p>de bas na rdul phra rab kyis ni rnam par shes pa mi bskyed la 'dus pas ni bskyed na yang rdzas don dam pa ma yin pas phyi rol gyi rdzas la spyod yul ni med do/ /phyi rol pa'i rdzas su yod pa'i rdul phra rab kyis bkag par gsungs pa ni phyogs kyi cha zhes bya ba la sogs pa
